1.content: So, which champ do you want to face.
1.title: Choices

11.content:
1. Shiver (Glaceon)

2. Male

3. He's been the ruthless sole champion of this tournament for five years, he's been beaten by newcomers countless times, he went absolutely revenge crazy for months, survived a breakup with Raunch without becoming a slave, he's seen his own flesh and blood cousin kidnapped by Sarah, and he's seen the kindness that was shown to him when he tried to get Fizzle back. He even started dating the first pokemon to ever take him down. After all of this, Shiver's had enough of being a bad guy, now, he just competes for fun.

4. Stink stats
Feet: Deadly
Farts: Deadly (x2)
Body Musk: Deadly
Butt (Without Farting): Deadly
Breath: Deadly (x3)

5. Stink resistance (--out of 100)

65/100

6. Any special abilities

Ice powers: I can use my ice power to freeze my opponents and torture them with impunity.

Reformation: Shiver has changed his ways, no longer the cruel champion with countless grudges, he's a lot friendlier now.

Melting: When facing a Fire type opponent, Shiver's stink resistance drops to 50 but his Feet and Body Musk double in stench
11.title: Champion Slot

111.content:
Lucky (Skuntank)

Female

After defeating Shiver I decided to make him my personal fart cushion till this day when I released him. My pride is that the ring reeks of that final fart which guaranteed my champion title. My farts are as bad as the "Champion Beater" and increase in toxicity with each fart. Prepare To Lose.

Feet: Very Bad
Farts: Ungodly
Body Musk: Ungodly
Butt (Without Farting): Ungodly
Breath: Ungodly

Stink Resistance: 95/100

Special Abilities:
Poison Gas: Prolonged exposure to my gas causes a weakened state

Mind Games: It may seem like your winning but actually I'm not even trying.

Champion Beater: My gas is so rancid it stains the ring with its stench and makes smaller Pokemon fall in love with it


I giggle as I see you in the ring which surprisingly doesn't reek of the 'Champion Beater' anymore. "Hi Shiver, I'm a champion now and I would love to train with you, what do you say?"
111.title: A Friendly Training Session.

1111.content: I smile when I see you enter. You may have beaten me and forced me to be your unwilling fart cushion for a while, but that was all in the past. I actually respected you as a competitor, and I don't respect ANYONE. I say to you "sure, why not?"
1111.title: Training With Lucky

choices: Let's See What You Can Do?
11111.content: "So Shiver, how about you try and beat me this time, after all I wasn't even trying when I beat you." I chuckle as I start to toy with you already and the training match hasn't even started. "How about you give me a taste of what you can do since our last fight was one sided."
11111.title: Finally Training

111111.content: I grim maliciously, "oh, I'll show you what I can do alright. I'll show you just how much stronger than you I really am!" I charge right at you, put my butt in your face, and let loose an absolutely disgusting thirty second fart.
111111.title: Let's See What You Can Do

1111111.content: I chuckle as I sniff up your fart "Not bad for a champion, not near as good as mine of course, then again I'm a Skunktank." I chuckle as I wait for you to make your next move, seemingly toying with you by not even fighting
1111111.title: That's Wasn't Bad

11111111.content: I growl, getting irritated even though this is technically a practice match. Instead of farting again, I turned around and plant one of my front paws on your nose.
11111111.title: What Next?

111111111.content: "Now that's..." I was about to say better when I caught a whiff of your paw, it was stinkier then I remembered it to be. Then again, now that we were both Champions, I was surprised when it actually affected me. "Your paw reeks, do you ever wash." I tease.
111111111.title: Things Are Getting

1111111111.content: I smirk, "of course not, how would I get them to smell like this if I cleaned them? But come to think of it, maybe you can help me with that." I knock you onto your back and get on top of you. Then, I put one paw on your nose and the other, I hover it above your mouth and say, "open wide!"
1111111111.title: Stinky

11111111111.content: "I guess this is revenge for you being my fart cushion after I beat you, fine I'll amuse you...even though I'm not trying to beat you since I probably could beat you with just one fart." I open my mouth and then gag as I could smell your paw since you put it on my nose.
11111111111.title: Resistance Is Futile

111111111111.content: I growl as you insult me once again before shoving my paw into your open mouth, almost choking you with it. "Well?" I say, " its not going to lick itself."
111111111111.title: Paw Bath!

1111111111111.content: "Ha there's no way his paws are that bad, hmmmm maybe this was too easy into tricking him to lower his guard." I internally chuckled as I made the first lick on your paw..."Ewwwwwwwwww it's all sweaty and stuff, why did I expect it to taste like roses?" I internally cry as I continue to lick your paw, gagging on it every so often. "I'm the Queen Of Stink and I've been reduced to a paw licking..." I internally stop myself before I go any further.
1111111111111.title: Paws Are Horrid

11111111111111.content: I smirk as I see the looks of disgust on your face, "taste good? They should, I haven't washed them once in my entire life so they should have plenty of 'flavor'." I laugh as I start to rub my paw across your tongue while I push the other one harder against your nose, making sure you can't smell anything but my nasty pawstink.
11111111111111.title: Not What I Expected

111111111111111.content:
"Ewwwwwwww that's gross even by my standards and I'm the Queen Of Stink, no matter, just licking won't." I then gag as you make me breathe and taste nothing but you paws, then again I've never been in a "losing" situation since becoming a champ and this isn't even a proper match, then again I'm better then you, I beat you once I'll do it again. I then swiftly kick your back paws out and rill so you're now on the bottom, I proceed to spit your paws out before forcing your mouth open and sticking both of my front paws in it as I lie ontop of you which makes it harder to get me off.

I then press my face close to yours and breathe up your nose. "Tables turned." I giggle.
111111111111111.title: They Taste Like...Sweat

choices: You turn around and sit on my face
1111111111111111.content: I scream into your paws as I'm forced to taste all of the dirt and grime on them, I almost throw up at the revolting taste. Speaking of revolting, as I get a sniff of your breath, my eyes cross from the disgusting smell. You are beating me again and you're still hardly trying!
1111111111111111.title: Now You Taste My Paws

11111111111111112.content: "I know what to do that you'd enjoy." I chuckle as I take my sopping wet paws out of your mouth before quickly turning and planting my sweaty stinky butt onto your face. "Feels like this is your natural place to me, since your so easy to beat, I might as well have a seat." I chuckle as I wiggle my rancid ass on your face so you can breathe nothing but my ass odour, thankfully I wasn't farting...yet.
11111111111111112.title: Back To Being A Cushion Again

choices: You don't bother, after all, at this rate I'll pass out from your butt alone
111111111111111121.content: I struggle as hard as I can, trying desperately to escape your disgusting rear end. But no matter how hard I push, I just can't seem to make you budge. What's worse, all this exertion is forcing me to take bigger and bigger sniffs of your disgusting ass to the point where I'm already seeing double.
111111111111111121.title: Your Place...Under My Ass

1111111111111111212.content: "Hey you're not fighting back, you've gotten weaker from all those fights, then again I cannot say anything due to me not participating much." I chuckle as I wiggle my sweaty ass on you and then...get up, surprisingly I want you to try and beat me even though it's near impossible
1111111111111111212.title: Sniff My Ass

11111111111111112121.content: Now, normally I'd jump at the opportunity to strike my opponent, but you aren't just any opponent. I've already hit you with my nastiest smells and you hardly flinched! I do the last thing that anyone would ever expect me to do. I stand up and jam my face into your butt saying, "I admit it, I can't beat you, just get it over with."
11111111111111112121.title: Not one for charity

111111111111111121211.content: I smile as you get up but then yelp as you jam your face against my butt and say what you said. "You really can't beat me? Is that why you aren't fighting back, now that you mention it." I start to think of the previous battle and get lost in thought which would be the best time to attack...or freeze me.
111111111111111121211.title: Not What I Expected

1111111111111111212111.content: Realizing that you're too busy daydreaming to just end the match already, I decide to take matters into my own hands. Grimacing, I quietly mumble, "I can't believe I'm doing this." Before taking a huge sniff of your butt. My eyes water as the horrible stench invades my nostrils. I cough a few times before sniffing again, and again, and again, effectively torturing myself on your sweaty ass.
1111111111111111212111.title: Lost In Thought

11111111111111112121111.content: "Yeah that would work." I chuckle as I snap out of my thought, I'm even more confused when I see you taking WILLING sniffs of my ass and big ones at that. "Hey aren't you suppose to be training with me, I'd call that cushion training if I were you?" I chuckle nervously not know what your actual goal was since I did come here to TRAIN with a champion and not get a new CUSHION.
11111111111111112121111.title: What?

111111111111111121211111.content: Truth be told, I forgot you were here to train and not fight. Usually champions train at the training facility, not in the ring. I quickly shake my head and try to come up with an excuse. "J-just getting a bit of stink resistance training in. After all, the ability to take a fart to the face is just as important as being able to do the farting!" With that, I take one last sniff, just to make my story more believable before walking to your front and belching in your face.
111111111111111121211111.title: Confused

1111111111111111212111111.content: "No offense Shiver but I know that's not what you were doing." I chuckle as I belch back in your face. "I know you love my ass so much that you want to be my cushion but I came here to train with you and if this were a fight, I'd have won the moment you tok sniffs from my ass." I smile. "So anyway, we gonna do a training fight or what? If you called that a fight then you'd be sorely mistaken." I wink before going back to my corner
1111111111111111212111111.title: Pathetic Excuse...For An Excuse

11111111111111112121111111.content: I growl angrily at your biting words before running right at you. I plant my butt in your face and let off a downright lethal twenty second silent fart, heck, it even smelled worse than your "champion beater." I laugh and say, " how's that for a fight?!"
11111111111111112121111111.title: The Mock Fight?

111111111111111121211111111.content: "You think that's a fight, you've gotten soft." I chuckle as I roll my legs over your head and hold your head against my ass as I release an equally potent fart since all of my farts are now as smelly as the "champion beater"
111111111111111121211111111.title: Not Bad...For A Starter

1111111111111111212111111111.content: I try to pull my head away from your disgusting ass, but I can't seem to escape your grip. I cough and sputter as the horrific stench of your fart enters my nose.
1111111111111111212111111111.title: Head locked

11111111111111112121111111111.content: "For crying out loud Shiver, you are humiliating, to think you were the first champion makes me gag." I sigh as I let out another champion beater smelling fart as I can't seem to muster anything more powerful yet...or I could just be holding back till you start fighting properly.
11111111111111112121111111111.title: You really are pathetic

112.content:
Aqueous (Vaporeon)

Male

A Vaporeon who entered to try and beat Shiver. Mostly he wanted to beat one of every eeveelution, so decided this would be a good place to fight a Glaceon. Unfortunately, he was in such a rush he completely forgot to train his different smells.

Stink stats
Feet: Slightly bad
Farts: Unscented
Body Musk: : Unscented
Butt (Without farting):Unscented
Breath: Unscented

Stink resistance: 12/100

Special abilities
Easily Frozen: Being almost made of water, Aqueous is easily frozen from ice attacks. This is one of his largest weaknesses

Water Sneak: He has the natural ability of Vaporeon to sink into water in enough amounts. He might attempt to flood the ring in order to use this to his advantage.
112.title: Challenger

1121.content: I see you enter and a smile appears on my face when I don't smell anything. I say "oh good, you're going to be easy,I always love it when my playthings can't fight back." I walk up to you and place one of my paws in your face, letting you get a preview of the stench to come.
1121.title: Eeveelution battle

11211.content: I instantly wretched when I got a sniff of your paw stink, wondering what you had stepped in to make your paw smelled so horrible. I backed up, head already spinning from the horrible assault on my nose. "That's just wretched.."
11211.title: Like what you smell?

112111.content: "Well, if you think that's bad, try this!" I turn around and shove my butt into your face and let out a putrid ted second fart. I then cut another fart, this one only five seconds but twice as smelly.
112111.title: Continue

choices: It gives me a small moment to recover
1121111.content: I coughed and choked on the smell of the fart, it being worse because of the fact my nose was right against your butt during the fart.. I fall back, looking disgusted as I fire a Water Pulse to try and hurt you.
1121111.title: Continue

11211111.content: The pulse barely hurts me,I get mad and start to make my way towards you with the intent of shoving both of my front paws in your mouth and belching in your face. However I take one step and the world starts to spin. Your attack confused me, giving you plenty of time to recover as I stumble all over the ring.
11211111.title: It gives me a small moment to recover

choices: You have an idea to get me out
112111111.content: I started to take the time to recover, glad I could get my nose back to normal as I used a Surf attack at you, hoping to fill the ring enough with water to disappear into it. After enough water started to fill, I disappeared, trying to stay away from you.
112111111.title: Continue

1121111112.content: I didn't know how you managed to pull that little disappearing act of yours,but I wasn't moving until I saw you again. I stand perfectly still and wait for you to show your face, so I could shove my paws into it.
1121111112.title: You just wait

11211111121.content: I decided to not pop out, using the water to battle instead as I sent a wave rolling over you, hoping to fight you without showing my actual self during the fight.
11211111121.title: Continue

112111111211.content: I jump out of the way of the wave before an idea comes to mind. I jump out of the water and fire an ice beam at it. The water freezes and I wait for you to appear.
112111111211.title: Continue

choices: You just break the ice around my head, leaving me easy to torture.
1121111112111.content: After the water froze I reappeared outside of it, completely frozen and helpless. I could just move my eyes, staring as I waited for you to react to my situation.
1121111112111.title: Come out wherever you are

11211111121111.content: "Oh come on, that was way too easy, " I complain when I see you reappear completely frozen. "Alright, I'm going to break you out of the ice. But,I want you to make this fight interesting okay?" I don't even wait for a response before walking over to you and smashing all of the ice on you.
11211111121111.title: You break me out completely

112111111211111.content: As soon as you break me out, I get a grin of my face. "Interesting huh? Let's see how you fare against this~" I say, looking like I'm building something up in my throat, finally spitting out a large purple ball of goo, obviously Toxic.
112111111211111.title: Continue

1121111112111111.content: I jump up in the air just in time to dodge your attack. I land on your back and quickly take advantage of my position by placing both of my front paws on your face and rubbing them around.
1121111112111111.title: You dodge it in time

11211111121111111.content: I struggled in your grip, feeling your weight on my back and paws in my face as I collapsed, landing on my stomach under you as I tried to struggle free from your paws.
11211111121111111.title: Continue

112111111211111111.content: "Heh, struggle all you want, you can't get out of this. You know, I heard that Lucky keeps some of the challengers that she beats as her own cushions. Maybe I should keep you as my personal paw sniffer." I laugh at the thought and press my paws harder into your face, making sure you get a good whiff of the stench.
112111111211111111.title: Continue

1121111112111111111.content: I cringed from the thought of spending my days servicing your paws, quickly using Toxic again on your paws and hoping it'd do something good for me, hoping I wouldn't be subdued quickly by the stench.
1121111112111111111.title: Continue

11211111121111111111.content: "Owwwwwwww" I scream in pain as the toxic burns my paws. "Okay, you asked for it!" I fire an ice beam at your mouth to seal it shut so you couldn't fire any more of that sludge at me. I then turn around and plant my butt in your face before letting of a twenty second fart into it.
11211111121111111111.title: Continue

112111111211111111111.content: My mouth was completely sealed by the Ice Beam, leaving me to sniff up the entirety of your fart. I seemed incredibly weakened by the gas, still barely able to try and stand to escape from you.
112111111211111111111.title: Continue

1121111112111111111111.content: I roll my eyes at your pathetic attempt to stand up again. I quickly snuff out any of your remaining strength with a five minute long barrage of farts to your face.
1121111112111111111111.title: Continue

11211111121111111111111.content: I let out a muffled groan, the last fart having completely sapped my will to fight. I crashed down onto the ground, completely weak and at your mercy as I awaited your next move.

112111111211111111111111.content: I get off of you for a second before I use my ice beam once again to create a restraint across your stomach so you couldn't get up. I then decide it's time to figure out why you're here. I remove the ice from your mouth and ask you "okay, you obviously signed up to face me for a reason, but you have no stink ability, why would you sign up for this without any smells?"
112111111211111111111111.title: Continue

1121111112111111111111111.content: I chuckle, glad to see you so close. "Well.. You see... Saying I had no smells on the recruitment form.. That was... A bit of a truth and a lie... I don't have stinks from any of the normal things you'd expect.. But.. Get a sniff of some of that Toxic on your hands would you?" I snicker, wanting to see how you handle it.
1121111112111111111111111.title: Answer Me

11211111121111111111111111.content: I sniff one of my front paws and immediately recoil, it smelled absolutely horrible. I say to you "huh, that's actually pretty bad, but you won't get far in these tournaments with only one stinky ability. You'll need more, this match is already proof of that. Then again, I find it hard to believe that a water type pokemon can't make themselves sweat a lot the way fire types do, I mean sweat is mostly water."
11211111121111111111111111.title: Continue

112111111211111111111111111.content: "Well... Perhaps.. Though there's the fact I'm MADE of water... So wouldn't that technically mean I should be made of sweat by this point?" I ask, soon looking at how sweaty you were and getting an evil grin on my face.
112111111211111111111111111.title: Continue

1121111112111111111111111111.content: "Well, there are other things in sweat that make it smell bad, but the body produces those naturally, the water just helps flush it out onto your skin. I don't know if the same rules apply if you're made of water, but that's how it works for other pokemon. "
1121111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

choices: Sure, no harm done I guess
11211111121111111111111111111.content: I didn't even take a moment before deciding my next move, looking along you. "Hey... You know those sweaty paws?... Mind if I get to touch them? Just to see how the sweat is of course.. Need to find out how sweaty I should make myself."
11211111121111111111111111111.title: Continue

112111111211111111111111111111.content: "Sure, always willing to help a fellow eeveelution get ahead in this tournament." I completely release you from your icy binding and step off of you. I then hold up one of my paws for you to inspect.
112111111211111111111111111111.title: Sure, no harm done I guess

1121111112111111111111111111111.content: I rubbed my own paw against yours, suddenly seeming to disappear, a chill rushing across your body as it seems like all your sweat is going crazy, bouncing from part to part of you.
1121111112111111111111111111111.title: Continue

11211111121111111111111111111111.content: I have no idea what is happening. First you disappear and then my sweat starts to move around like crazy! I then realize what you did. You used your ability to disappear into my sweat, and I couldn't freeze you out without freezing myself. I decided to just try and wait it out, you have to emerge sometime.

112111111211111111111111111111111.content: I didn't pop out until a few moments later, but by that point, it was definitely a huge change from before. In other words, I was pretty much made of your sweat by this point.

1121111112111111111111111111111111.content: I sniff the air once and immediately started choking and coughing, your body odor was RANCID!!! I couldn't move any closer to you, the smell was so bad. I stand my ground and wait for you to make the next move.

11211111121111111111111111111111111.content: I smirk and walk closer, deciding to give you a taste of your own medicine as I lower my own paws down onto your nose. I rubbed them over your face, letting the stink of your own sweat cover your face.

112111111211111111111111111111111111.content: Your paws smelled terrible for sure, but I wasn't going to let you win just like that. I turn around, plant my butt in your face, and let out a silent and extremely deadly fart.

1121111112111111111111111111111111111.content: I was completely stunned by the stench of your fart, backing up and trying to catch my breath as I hacked and coughed, seeming extremely weak from the gassing.
1121111112111111111111111111111111111.title: Continue

11211111121111111111111111111111111111.content: I didn't relent, I backed up to keep my butt in your face. I let out three more farts into your face, rubbing the smell in before cutting a minute long fart that could have choked a Gloom!

choices: Don't let me faint just yet
112111111211111111111111111111111111111.content: I fell over on my back, barely able to keep my eyes open to stop from fainting. I looked up to you, wondering what you'd do now.
112111111211111111111111111111111111111.title: Still Awake?

1121111112111111111111111111111111111111.content: "You know," I say, "you actually smell pretty bad now, you could probably beat some of the weaker contestants with that stench. But unfortunately for you, I don't go down so easily. " I sit on your face and cut another minute long fart, this one managing to smell even worse than the last.
1121111112111111111111111111111111111111.title: Time to finish it

1121111112111111111111111111111111111111.content:
This fart was enough to knock me out, the horrible smell making me almost want to vomit as I tried to struggle. I gave in about halfway through the fart, completely knocked out by the end of it.

You win.
1121111112111111111111111111111111111111.title: You unconscious yet?

113.content:
1. Draco (Eveee)

2. Male

3. Don't be fooled by my appearance, I may seem small and harmless by I'm actually quite a high level, and my body reeks something fierce. I never bathe, and do my best to keep my body smelling as bad as possible. I was never able to decide just what evolution I wanted to be, there being so many of them, so for now I've merely decided to stay an Eveee. This often gives me an edge over my opponents as they underestimate me, still I'm vulnerable to any really horrible stench as most pokemon are.

4. Stink stats
Feet: Very Bad
Farts: Very Bad
Body Musk: Very Bad
Butt (Without Farting): Unbearable
Breath: Pretty Bad

5. Stink resistance 60/100

6. Special abilities: Cute Appearance: Most of my opponents fall for my harmless appearance, meaning they underestimate me greatly.

I strode into the champion's room, my filthy paws tracking dirt onto the ground as I walked. I was quite surprised to see that you were of the same pokemon family as me, though I doubted you would show me any mercy because of that. I smirked as I walked up to you and let out a rather rude, smelly burp towards you. "Hi. I guess you're the champion?"
113.title: New Challenger

1131.content: I was shocked to see an eevee walk in. And I was even more shocked by your smell! I normally went easier on fellow eeveelutions, at least giving them the first move,but it looked like I might regret doing it this time. I stand up and say "huh, you actually smell like you might be challenging, I'll let you have the first move, show me what you can do! "
1131.title: Continue

choices: Is it too much for you?
11311.content: I smiled and chuckled to myself a bit. "Alright!" No matter who I faced, they always seemed to let me have the first move, or go easy on me for most of the match. I on the other hand, never went easy on my opponents. So, I used the smelliest part of my body on you first. I turned around and shoved my smelly butt right against your face. While it was small, the smell was outright deadly. And I wasn't even that much of a gassy pokemon!
11311.title: Making the first move

113111.content: You were right, the smell of your butt was downright putrid! I take one whiff and am thrown into a coughing fit! I then get an idea on how to make this interesting. You were still an eevee, so you were pretty small. I keep my nose in your butt, and reach one of my front paws around and put it in your face. Your butt was bad, but I think my paws have them beat, but it was anyone's game right now, with my face in your butt and your face with my paw on it.
113111.title: Is it too much for you?

1131111.content:
I smiled as I saw you cough from just how bad my butt was, it seemed even too much for a champion! But I was surprised to find your paw in my face, and I was soon retching and gagging from the rancid smell that was wafting off of them. I could hardly believe they smelled so bad, it and was just one paw! I had thought mine were filthy, but yours had a much stronger, fouler stench to them...

I soon realized what you had planned as you kept your nose in my butt, still smelling. While my rear was smelly, I just couldn't stand the stench of your paws. I gagged, knowing that I wasn't going to be able to beat you. So I did the only thing I could think of, I farted in your face.
1131111.title: Continue

11311111.content: Your fart invades my nose and makes the smell even worse than before! I get dizzy as I take a sniff of the fart that made the smell on par with my paw. The stakes had been raised, but I wasn't going to lose that easily, you still had to sniff my paw.
11311111.title: Excuse me

113111111.content:
I frowned as you still kept your face in my butt, something most pokemon wouldn't want to do right after I had farted. But you were champion after all, I shouldn't have expected to beat you with one fart. I groaned and kept sniffing your paw, which was already making me very dizzy at this point.

After about a minute I just couldn't take the smell of your awful paw anymore, and fell to the ground coughing. "Ugh... you've got some pretty nasty paws Mr. Champion..." You had won the first round, but I knew this match was far from over.
113111111.title: Can't take it

1131111111.content: "Why thank you, " I say "here, try both of them together! " I actually lay on top of you so you can't get away and shove both of my smelly paws into your face. "Trust me, it's much worse when there's two of them."
1131111111.title: Continue

11311111111.content: You weren't joking, it was far worse when here was two of them! The smell was at least twice as bad... I gagged and sputtered as you laid on top of me, being so much smaller I didn't have any hope of pushing you off. "What did you do to make your paws so smelly?!" I yelled out, having to take another breathe of your vile paws. I only hoped that you might go easy on me...
11311111111.title: Putrid Paws

113111111111.content: I push one of my paws into your mouth to keep you from talking, I was always annoyed when my playthings don't shut up. I decide to answer your question anyways "my paws smell so bad because I'm an ice type. We tend to sweat a lot more than an average pokemon, it's almost like an ice pokemon version of melting. And all of that sweat makes you absolutely reek within two days if you don't bathe. My last bath was four years ago.
113111111111.title: Continue

13.content:
Mio (Cinccino)

Male

From whimp to champion, Mio has had a very interesting run. He started off without any smells at all, eventually going to defeat two champions in succession to become one himself. He also gained new abilities from every match, studying his opponents and using what they did to him in order to become stronger and smellier. This has left him with plenty of strategies for fighting opponents, and he's willing to use any and all of them to make sure he doesn't lose his title. His strongest attribute by far is his breath, it having taken down most of his opponents

Feet: Ungodly
Farts: ungodly
Body Musk: Ungodly
Butt(Without Farting): Unbearable
Breath:Ungodly (Times two)

Stink resistance: 79 out of 100

Any special abilities:
Fur whips: Mio's fur is very stretchy and can be used almost like hands. This means he often uses it for grapple-like moves. He can use it to pull an opponent close, forcing them to get a whiff of his stink.

Sweet Kiss: Many adorable Pokemon have the move sweet kiss, but Mio decided to improvise his own. He normally starts by using his fur to pull his opponent close to his mouth, before forcing them into a disgusting and stinky kiss. He normally saves this move for female opponents of course. Also, because of the ungodly stink the kiss brings, it often confuses like the move it's named after.

Size usage: While Mio is small, he normally uses this to his advantage, able to dodge attacks and move quickly to avoid opponents.

Extreme strength: Mio is extremely strong for a Pokemon of his size, able to use his fur to grapple with Pokemon much larger then him. Even he has his limits on what he can fight, but he certainly is stronger then most of his species

Cute Charm: If an opponent is susceptible to it, Mio can distract his opponents with cuteness. This is normally used to make his opponents stop fighting so he can abuse the moment. Though he does have other uses for it.
13.title: Champion Mio

Feet:Bad

Butt (Without Farting): Unscented
Breath: Unscented

30/100

1522.title: Champion and Champion

15221.content:
1. Jason (Dewott) [Main]

2. Male

3. Brave but sadistic at some times, I was adopted at a young age by 2 different Pokemon. My mother was just a normal pokemon, but my father, however, was a former smelly Pokemon Tournament champion. He taught and trained me all about this tournament and how to fight using my stench. He sadly passed on a while ago, but I carry on his legacy as a champion. My main weapons are my farts, but I have a wide arsenal of other stinks to use on my opponent. In fact, when I say "my farts are bad", In reality, my farts could probably knock very small pokemon out in one blast. My only weak point is that I still haven't gotten over my merciful side. Me and Sammy here went to Pokemon school together, although he dropped out and I graduated. As soon aI found out he was in the tournament too, we decided to team up!

4. Stink Stats
Feet: Ungodly
Farts: Deadly x5
Body Musk: Putrid
Butt (without farting): Deadly
Breath: Ungodly

5. Stink Resistance: 65/100

6. Special Abilities

-Stinky Shell v2.0: as you may know, all Oshawott and its evolved forms all have a shell used for combat. I'm no different, but my shell is a bit more rounded. I can use this by burping, breathing, or farting into it, then thrusting it into my opponents nose and holding it there so they get the full smell. After defeating Shiver, I remodeled my shell so it can store smells inside of it.

-Gassy Ice Prison (only used as a last resort): This move was created by me. I encase both me and the enemy in a spherical ice dome. I then fill it almost to the top with water. I can then fart continuously in there. Of course, I'm a water-type, so I can stay underwater. As for my opponent however, they can either drown or they can surface to the top and breathe my farts. I can choose to be merciful and let them out at any time, or I can just wait until they faint.

. Sammy (Stantler)

2: Male

3: A young Preteen, I was shunned at Pokemon school by my peers because of my stench and also because I was smaller than most Stantler. It caused me so much pain that I dropped out of school. Nothing to do, I aimlessly wandered, looking for something I could do. That was when I discovered the Smelly Pokemon Tournament! It was perfect for me, and therefore I joined. My main weapons are my hooves, but if you think that's my only weapon, you got another thing coming to you. Me and Jason know each other from Pokemon school, although I dropped out and he went on with his studies. As soon as I saw Jason a Champion, we decided to tag team!

Butt (Without Farting): Bad
Breath: Slightly Bad

(40 out of 100)

1532.content:
1. Blaze (Ninetails.)

2. Female.

3. While once a small, timid Vulpix, since beating the champ I've evolved into a full grown Ninetales! Not only that, after beating constant losers with my stink I've begun to enjoy inflicting my stench on weak pokemon. Very few pokemon had come close to beating me, as the stench of my paws was often too much for any other pokemon to even stand around me. Not to mention I kept the champion's room at a sweltering heat, so I would sweat a great deal. However I still had my one weakness that I could never get over, gas. Yet often my body's horrid stench was usually enough to take out my opponents before they had the chance to use it on me. Since facing many matches and dealing with horrid gas, I've built up my resistance to gas, and my weakness isn't as glaring as before.

4. Feet: Deadly
Farts: Putrid
Body Musk:Ungodly
Butt (Without Farting): Horrid
Breath: Putrid

5. Stink Resistance 98/100 (Weak to gas)

6. Any special abilities.

I can use my fire abilities to make myself sweat, and further increase my stench. I also have a particularly amusing trick where I set my gas alight, directly on my opponents.

I can trap my opponents in a fire spin of smelly, smelly fire.

I can use my tails to trap my opponent in a horrid dutch oven right near my hole.
