15321111112111211.content: The air was soon tainted with the stench of your gas. I was desperate to get away from the eggy stench of your tails. I remain still, whimpering and saying "I'll do anything...please...just lemme out..." I was serious, I would be doing anything you wanted me t do just to get away from this gassy dutch oven.
15321111112111211.title: You're right

choices: You don't, I guess you're staying in there.
153211111121112111.content: I let out an airy, yet still very smelly fart as I heard your pleas. My tails made a surprisingly air tight seal, and very little of my gas leaked out. "Hmm, anything? Anything at all? Well... if you smooch my hole, just like you would smooch your girlfriend, I'll let you out." I shake my rear and prepare one of my worst farts. "And it has to be for a full thirty seconds. I'll be counting!"
153211111121112111.title: Anything?

1532111111211121111.content: About to break into tears, I say "Fine. Anything but this." And start to pucker up. My lips touch your tailhole. It was disgusting, and the taste was awful, but I had to do this. I count in my head "One...two...three..." Not knowing that you had something in plan...
1532111111211121111.title: You kiss my hole

choices: You're still awake, and very angry!
The gas was too much for you and you passed out
15321111112111211111.content: I moaned loudly as soon as you started kissing my filthy hole. "Wow, I'm surprised you're doing this! You must really want out..." Smirking, I let out the huge, silent fart I had been holding it. It seeped down your throat and probably seared your tongue with its burning stench. "Ahh, what a relief... I bet you'll be tasting that for days!" Another fart blasted out of my hole and into your mouth as my count reached twenty. "Only ten more seconds!" I chimed and kept farting, as you nearly finished I farted more and more. In the last five seconds I was ripping nasty farts every second. "Your mouth makes a great fart catcher. "I taunt and shake my rear as I finally reached thirty. "Okay, you're done. You can stop kissing, unless you want to keep doing it!" I let you out of my tails and you fall on the ground, the horrid stench that was trapped in them now filling the room.
15321111112111211111.title: Let er rip?

153211111121112111111.content: I slowly get back up, gulping down the fresh(er) air around me. I drop to my knees, the gassing had definitely affected me. I notice my shell was next to me, and I snatch it up. Breathing heavily, I say "You're...gonna...pay...for...that...." I glow blue, signaling either my sacrificial defense for offense move or my ice prison. You had to guess what it was, that was the best part.
153211111121112111111.title: Angry, but unable to do anything about it

1532111111211121111111.content: I gasped in fear as you started to glow blue, just like you had last match right before you trapped my in that smelly fart filled dome. Not wanting to end up in such a stinky place again, I back up from you and get a good distance away. "You're not getting me with that trick again! Don't think I'll fall for it!" I stay as far away from you as possible, if I didn't get close than you couldn't trap me, yet at the same time I couldn't exactly KO you... Yet, I was still unsure of just what move you were trying to pull of...
1532111111211121111111.title: Choose wisely...

15321111112111211111111.content: Soon, I stop glowing blue, but something seemed different. You took a sniff of the air and noticed that my stench had increased by one level. I smirk and say "Didn'ta think of this, haven't you?" I rush up to you, ready to pin you and enditone and for all, when...
15321111112111211111111.title: You guessed wrong.

153211111121112111111111.content: I was worried when I had noticed that you were suddenly smelling quite a lot worse, I guess the move you used wasn't the one I thought it was... Suddenly I found yourself charging up to me, unable to even react you knock me down and pin. I noticed your shell was still in hand, so I knew exactly what was coming. "No, no get off! I'm not losing to you again!" I kick and struggle under you as much as possible, I knew now that I should never have let you out of my tails. I could have won the match if only I had kept you in them...
153211111121112111111111.title: Get Hit

choices: Oooh, talkin about the tails again
1532111111211121111111111.content: I pretty much had it in the bag. I pinned you down, ready to plant my ass in your face. But as I let out a single fart, your tails hit me smack dab in the face. That, and your struggles, are enough to knock me off of you and to the ground. Trying to get back up, I say "I swear I will tie those tails together if I see you again..."
1532111111211121111111111.title: Damn your tails!

15321111112111211111111111.content: While I was glad I had gotten you off, I was very annoyed you had talked about my tails like that. To any Ninetails their tails were extremely precious to them, many spent most of their time grooming them, and almost all would 'curse' anyone who pulled one as a joke. "Oh, you hate my tails do you?! Well. how about you get real close to them again?" Growling I pounced on top of you and wrapped several tails around your head, while not sealing you in the dutch oven your face was still covered in sweaty fur. "Take some deep sniffs of my tails, or I'm going to wrap you up like before." I coughed slightly on the fart you had let out, but it wasn't enough to stun to me.
15321111112111211111111111.title: Never insult my tails!

153211111121112111111111111.content: As the tails coil around me, I try to tug them off, but no dice. I take a voluntary sniff and dry heave. The stench was unbearable, and the sweat made it even worse. Struggling, I murmur "Mffmfmfmfm". I was just muttering jumbled crap, but I hope it would be enough to get your tails offa me.
153211111121112111111111111.title: Why did I have to open my big mouth

choices: Do you give in to my stinky tails?
1532111111211121111111111111.content: I laughed at your pathetic attempts to talk to me. There was nothing I loved more than hearing my opponents muffled by my stinky body, especially my beloved tails. I wrapped my tails tighter around you, to the point that it was almost hurting you. At this point in the match my body had reached almost its maximum temperature, and you could feel the heat radiating off of me. The heat only made the smell much worse for you as it amplified it. "Keep sniffing down there! There's so much wonderful tail stench for you to take in!"
1532111111211121111111111111.title: No mercy!

15321111112111211111111111111.content: I soon give up, staying limp from your tails. The combined stench and heat was so bad, and the tails were positioned so I had to breathe through my nose. When I open my mouth, salty sweat trickles into it and I immediately close it. I sigh, saying in a muffled tone "All right...I give in..." I involuntarily breathe in the stinky, musky tailstink.
15321111112111211111111111111.title: Please...

153211111121112111111111111111.content: "HA! I knew I could beat you! You put up a fight for awhile there, but I beat you in the end." I shook my rump and tails, causing you to move slightly with them. "I do have to admit you're a tough fighter, you really beat me with that ice prison attack last match... I think I'm going to have nightmares of that for a long while..." I shudder as I recall being trapped in that fetid, putrid dome filled with gas and water. "But, I hope you'll have nightmares of this." I smirked and wrapped the rest of my tails around you, your body absorbing all of the sweat from my tails. I pull one of my tails away from your mouth, "Well, any last words before I trap you in my tails before you pass out?"
153211111121112111111111111111.title: Well, it's over...

1532111111211121111111111111111.content: I only say a few words. The few words that will give you paranoia for a while after the match. I say "I'll find your apartment soon..." I smirk at this, and the smell gets to me, I gag weakly, which is all that I can do.
1532111111211121111111111111111.title: Got any?

15321111112111211111111111111111.content:
I gasped at your response, the fear slightly getting to me. I'd have to be glancing behind my back for awhile now... "Well, why don't I make this KO as painful as possible for you then." I smirked and wrapped my tails as tight as possible, putting your body in a vice grip and smearing in my sweat. I let out by far my worst fart of the match, a long, particularly wet one that reeked horribly! Within only a few seconds of breathing in my gas you get weak, and after having endured so much stink, you soon pass out from the stench. I uncurl my tails and you dropped to the ground, covered in sweat and smelling like my ass. "That's what you get for beating me the first time... Cya later Jason." I blew my tongue at you playfully and pranced out of the ring, my tails swinging behind me as I left. However your last comment was still stuck in my head, and I tried my best to forget about it...

I won.
15321111112111211111111111111111.title: Victory!

1533.content: More people for me to fight!
1533.title: More choices!

15331.content:
Name: [Nameless] (Aromatisse)

Gender: "Female I think!"

Bio:
Hello! I already took note of how I look in another entry. I've got a decent hat, and a more than decent coat and cane. Just decided to visit this tournament to see what's going on. The smells here are absolutely delightful. I was crowned champion recently, whatever that means.

Stink Stats:
Feet: The entire scale
Farts: The entire scale
Body Musk: The entire scale
Butt (Without Farting): The entire scale
Breath: The entire scale

Well I am an Aromatisse. What were any of you expecting? I can smell like whatever I want, so naturally, I smell fantastic!

Until I choose not to smell fantastic.

Stink resistance: 100/100

Special abilities:

My special ability isn't called anything in particular. Being an Aromatisse has the obvious perk of having control over scent itself. I can have you bear witness to smells that don't even exist as far as I can tell. Naturally I won't go overboard with this, I can change up my natural smells to suit whoever I'm facing. There's a smell for every nose I say!

Aside from that I do have this:

Ethereal Pipe: I confiscated this from another contestant. She's not happy about it, but it was originally mine. It's redundant in my hands but do I ever seem classy with it! What it does do is allow me to manipulate misty terrains and water in the air for all sorts of neat effects involving clouds and fogs.

"I received a letter requesting I face this "Jason", and I must say, he smells great today!"
15331.title: That Aromatisse

153311.content: I see you walk in, and I immediately gain interest in you. Looking you over, I say "So, you're that Aromatisse that Elen was talking about? You don't look all that hard to beat. And what do you mean, I smell great?!" I get ready for any tricks you may have in your head.
153311.title: So it begins?

1533111.content:
"Not difficult to beat?" I scratch my chin, perplexed by the choice of words. "That could be true. I wouldn't know. I haven't lost yet." I admit to the possibility of losing but then finally realize you were simply saying I didn't look difficult to beat. "Oh OH! Well thank you I suppose I do look quite frail... and possibly stylish." If I had a mouth I'd be smiling warmly.

"And but of course. Haven't you smelled yourself?" I say taking a few choice sniffs. "Hmm..." I seemed to be lost in thought for a moment. I tap the ground with my cane after a pause. "Well then I suppose I shouldn't waste any time." Unlike Elen I wasn't one to occasionally offer a free first move. You immediately feel a tugging sensation. The glow in my eyes indicative of a psychic grip. Without much delay you are brought close to me. I take a few more sniffs of the air around you.

"Hmm, you do have a preference for f-artillary." I chuckle at my own pun. "So I suppose you won't mind if the decisive blow for you will inevitably be a fart... though if you wish to object I can see why. I've got quite a large build." I nonchalantly rub my admittedly large backside. The telekinetic grip on you was unrelenting. Despite having said I wasn't going to waste much time I spent most of my first move talking. Though was there anything you could do under the force of my mind? I waited to see if you could do anything as I started to materialize my etheral pipe. The smoke forming at my feet and rising up to where a mouth would be and taking the shape of a fancy smoking pipe.
1533111.title: Casual Banter

15331111.content: As I am pulled towards you, I try to struggle, but it doesn't work. The smell in the air reminded me of Elen, but it was...different. Seeing you conjure the pipe, I say "So that was originally yours?" I see you rub your backside and can't help but chuckle. "Well, farts aren't just my only weapon, you know. I try and lean forward before attempting to breathe in your face.
15331111.title: Continue

153311111.content:
"Originally you say?" my curiosity piques as take a few sniffs of your breath, my gag reflex results in me coughing up some of my pipe smoke. I took great care in making sure that resulting pink smog went into your mouth. The humidity and the sickly smell from the pipe stuck to your mouth and made you go into a coughing fit as I continued to speak. I wave the rest of it away and take a deep breath of my pipe to clear my nostrils of your breath before continuing to speak.

"Yes. I see you must have seen Elen's matches. She said she needed to borrow it and in my infinite kindness I let her borrow it. Unfortunately all that is borrowed must be returned." I say ominously over your coughing. "Sadly, I don't forsee many victories for her without this. Her moxie will only carry her so far. You know the only thing she inherited from her upbringing under me was my tendency to blabber on and on about things. She wasn't very popular. Hopefully I will be though." I take a long drag from my pipe as your coughing subsides.

"So you say you have a strong breath? Hmm, I wonder how my breath even works. I mean where is mouth!?" I laugh heartily and then set you down. "Since I'm a fan of irony I'll have to beat you with breath, farts, and of course." I turn around and present you my fluffy rear. "My rear!"

At that instant a deafening fart sent you off your feet back to your end of the battlefield. The smell was atrocious but manageable. This fart was only to make a point after all. The scent lingered in your nose well after the fart occurred. Perhaps as a reminder that my smells were a lot stickier the normal. You didn't need any more evidence for this as you could still taste the smog I coughed up. The pleasant smell that I entered the arena with was fading. Something a bit more acrid taking its place.

"Looks like I'm about to become unpleasant." I point out the obvious and wait for your response after you full recover from what just happened.
153311111.title: This will be a blast

1533111111.content: The smell of the pipe smoke was like smog, instantly stickin To the insides of my nose and making me cough. Now let me remind you, your farts were unscented right now. But, now that you've said that you were about to get unpleasant, I couldn't really do much due to your extremely strong psychic hold. All I can do is let out a single fart and let it waft over to you, hoping to do something.
1533111111.title: Now it really begins

15331111111.content:
There was indeed a reaction, but probably not what you were expecting, at least I wasn't expecting you to expect it. I had taken a few choice sniffs of the wafting stench and rather than recoil in fear I simply wrinkled my nose and fanned it.

"Fishy. But not weird-fishy. Actually fishy. That's normal for you right?" I smoke my pipe and blow out a small cloud. I started smelling it, and you initially thought it was to clear my nostrils of your smell the smell started to waft over to you as I continued to speak. "Normal-Fishy. Not weird-fishy. Normal fishery? Hmmm." I was trailing off at this point but it became apparent that this wasn't mindless babble when the smoke finally wafted to you. It smelled vaguely of a fishery, or lots of dying fish. The image of a pile of fish seemed to form in your head against your will. A brain fog far stronger than any you've ever experienced forming.

I wasn't clearing my sinuses at all. I was trying to recreate the smell of your fart!

"Fish." I psychically turn the smog into the shape of a fish as I continue to tinker with it, absorbed in my work. I didn't particularly understand why there weren't other Aromatisse here. Shouldn't this place be perfect for us? This is literally what we do all day. Perhaps not. Very reminiscent of poison, I thought to myself, these champion level stenches. I then mused that's probably Skuntank would be the flagship pokemon of the tournament along with maybe Gloom and a few others venomous pokemon.

As I toiled with my smells it would dawn on you just what kind of opponent you were dealing with. At least that's what I expected you to think. I hoped you'd realize that I didn't use stench. Rather scent itself was an extension of my identity. It was my plaything. If it were not I couldn't really call myself an Aromatisse. I'd have to call myself a Jason or something!

I giggle for no apparent reason. Entertained by my own thoughts and musings, I nearly forgot I was in a match. I start dialing up the body musk to some unbearable levels. My body more than capable of generating an aroma veil scented after the very fishy smell I was working with. True enough I exhale a massive cloud of stench at you. It was visible thanks to the smoke generated from the pipe.

(I'm playing on the fact that you can read everything I wrote but Jason can't)
15331111111.title: Fairy of Scents

153311111111.content: Now this was really strange. I see you playing and toying around with your pipe, recreating a picture of fish. I get one whiff of your pipe smoke and I get it. "You're trying to recreate my fart, aren't you?" I say. However, before you can answer, I smell your body musk rise, and I notice a huge cloud of breath heading towards me. Still unable to do anything because of the psychic hold, I stand there as the cloud engulfs me and I begin to choke on the horrid stench.
153311111111.title: First Impressions?

1533111111111.content:
You feel the psychic hold drop you back onto your feet, since you were a fair distance away now. The smell you were gagging on was some sort of warped version of your fart. I did indeed breath out a replica of your fart with my own spin on it. I was now daintily tip-toeing over to you while using my cane for support. The musk increasing in intensity as I got closer. It reminded you of the sea since there was a very salty smell to it. Between the fish smell and the now approaching murky scent you were starting to feel nostalgia, just not a good way. In a way this reminded you of a vast ocean or lake you swam in just dialed up to 11 in the stink department.

At least that was my intention anyway. I had no idea what your background was. I could only guess really, so whether or not you were truly familiar with smell was beyond me. Though, given your reaction and I assumed it was relatively close to something you might have smelled before. I make a stop as I observe your reaction to it.

"Hmmm, is that it then?" I sounded almost bored. I kinda was now that I thought about it. I didn't know if you knew what I was talking about. I thought my question was clear enough. It perfectly captured why I was here. I wanted to experience truly unique scents and to play with smells I hadn't yet before. I breath out another cloud of deathly fish smell. Though you were no longer in my psychic hold the sticky smell would hit its mark and engulf you.

"Hmm..." I scratch my chin(?) and proceed to think about what other spins I could add to this smell of yours.
1533111111111.title: Nast-algia

15331111111111.content: The smell of the fishy cloud engulfs me and I gag and choke on the rotten odor. Weakly, I get back up and place my shell over my nose, to use as an air filter. "That's it..." I mutter. "I'm going all out." With that, I glow blue. However, it wasn't an Ice Prison move, as I stopped glowing after a bit. My smell had become slightly more potent. I had used my sacrificial defense for offense move, and now my stink resistance was zero, but my stats had gone up. With that, I lunge towards you, farting in my shell and thrusting it towards your nose.
15331111111111.title: So far not so good

153311111111111.content:
"Breaking out of your shell aren't you?" I say with a chuckle as you start glowing.

I notice the passion in your angry outburst. Readjusting my hat as the energy emanated off of you I wait to see where it'd lead. After all, I was honestly curious. It didn't take half of a brain to realize what you were doing as soon as you started lunging, if your words were anything to go by anyway, and I had to fight back the temptation to make it all for naught with a simple flick of my wrist and a psychic swat.

I even raised my hand to do so, but sensing this could lead somewhere interesting, I lower it. I didn't even move as you raised your shell up and started to thrust it toward my nose. My curiosity overcame my boredom so I chose to let it connect rather than amuse myself by grounding you. A concession for the latter was made as I did at the last second use psychic to slow you down. I just brought this coat and hat and I didn't want to get knocked onto the ground with them on yet. Didn't feel right. Maybe a match or two later, I thought, and I could allow that as I'd probably want a wardrobe change by then anyway. I started thinking about what I ought to wear next.

My thoughts were interrupted when the shell actually connected with my nose, comically I suppose at a that, given how long my nose was.
153311111111111.title: Connected

1533111111111111.content: I push your nose in, actually managing to trap the smell inside my shell. Your reaction wasn't as I had expected it. Oh, you were probably just checking how strong I was now, I needn't worry. With that, I lower my shell again and fartt in it once morel refreshing the smell in there before pressing it into your nose. "So? Any improvement from earlier?" I say with a smirk.
1533111111111111.title: You got a chance!

15331111111111111.content:
I seemed to be grimacing at the smell. Which I think means it's highly unpleasant. True to your stats and strength it was terrible. At that point I psychically lift and carry you with your shell back a bit before I turn to the side fan the air for a moment. I had yet to cleanse it with my pipe. I still seemed to be in a state of deep thought.

"Yes... it's stronger and far closer to the kind of smell I'm trying to find." I admitted. Though given your slightly confused expression you probably weren't expecting my tone to be so relieved. Even more shocking was that after a moment of respite from the stench you found the shell yanked out of your hand. It had hovered into my own hand after which I carefully examined and smelled it some more! The smell probably had faded but I seemed really into what I was doing.

"Hmmm..." I'd say in random intervals before finally saying "You've been in many many battles with this shell. I can smell it. You're quite determined! Spunky... stunky? No, spunky. Yes, that, very much! Youthful. You make me realize how old I am. Oh I can feel my hip aching just thinking about it." I hover the shell back as I put my hand on my hip and readjust my grip on my cane. I chuckle.

"I'm kidding. Though old I am indeed my body is physically very young. I've got a few hundred years left in me." I force you psychically onto your bum and walk over to you and present my own bum to you.

"I do believe it's my turn... isn't it? Your best was delightful but allow me to show you some of my best. Fine tuned just for you. Let's call it an... assessment." I hissed almost seductively. My musk was quickly rising to some rather rotten degrees. Far greater than before. It almost felt like you were in a dutch oven. I haven't even farted yet! My figure towered far over yours in stature and bulk. I lifted the coattails of my black cloak to reveal a predictably fluffy bottom. I don't think you could possibly imagine how strong my stenches could be so I gave it a moment to sink in for you.
15331111111111111.title: Ass-essment

153311111111111111.content: As you yank the shell out of my hand, I wildly grab for it, but no dice. At first I thought you would be using it against me, but then you hover it back to me. Why would you just give me back my defensive strategy? Shrugging, I see you walk towards me, the powerful musk getting stronger and stronger. It reminded me slightly of Elen, and I shuddered to think of that match. As you turn around, the putrid stench only escalates even faster, and I try to pinch my nose. However, you had me in your psychic hold again, and I'm forced to inhale your disgusting musk. I manage to get out, worried tone, "What do you mean, assessment?!"
153311111111111111.title: Impending Fluff?

1533111111111111111.content:
"Quite, literally, an assessment of how I smell! I was impressed by your earnest attempt to be foul and I really would like to return the favor." I say casually. My mammoth rear inches ever closer to your face stopping short briefly as I finished my statement and got my coat out of the way just for you. "Your best for my best. Fair trade, not a jest!" I rhyme and with a quick wiggle of my butt it came crashing down on your face. Though it was gentle enough to not cause much injury.

This is when things probably weren't very pleasant for you. I could only imagine I mean. While I did say I'd give you my best I wasn't sure quite what that meant. Smells could take many shapes and forms and I wasn't sure what kind of smell to give you. So I just dialed it up to 11 out of 10 for whatever smell I already had out at the time. The imagery of a putrid fishery filled to the brim with the years' catch now rotting in a veritable hell.

You didn't have of a choice I reasoned since you didn't have any leverage to get me off of you. For one with such small legs cold feet was no longer an option for you. I giggle for no apparent reason.

I grind my rear down a bit, trying to get a bit more comfortable, and take a long drag from my pipe. I didn't breath the smoke out yet. As you struggled against my backside I'd rip you a new one. Right across your face. A rather forceful and pungent fart nearly comically lifted me off of you. It was complete with pink smog. Apparently my smoke went in one end and out the other. Colored for convenience!

"I bet Elen never tried to do that with the pipe." I say, mostly to myself for more entertainment as I rested upon you. I "Ahhh~" in releif as I let out second raunchy fart. The invasive stench not only invaded your sense of smell but it was enough to heat up your whole face. With a quick wiggle the pipe starts producing a misty terrain around the immediate vicinity. You couldn't smell it, you had more than enough worry about back there I say! But you could feel the sticky misty forming as it was condensing on the parts of you that were exposed.

I was actually carefully observing your reaction at this point. I conveniently forgot your defenses had gone down. Or did I? Perhaps this was a bit mean of me.
1533111111111111111.title: In the Hot Seat

15331111111111111111.content: The first fart rips across my face, bringing with it the truly lethal stench of a year old fishery on a blazing hot day. The smell made me retch and gag, and I couldn't even stop as the second one blasts my face and invades my nostrils. The sticky mist was sticking on my nose, making it even more vulnerable to your stinks. I become blurry eyed and dizzy, and you had just farted twice! Coughing and groaning, I say "Woah....that's *cough cough* strong...."
15331111111111111111.title: Poor Jason?

153311111111111111111.content:
Talking into my rear proved cumbersome with all the fluff getting in the way and potentially muffling you. Despite that I could hear you just fine and I give some air to breath by lifting myself up a bit more. The light stung your eyes and the fresh air was almost a shock. You didn't quite expect me to relent but it seems that wasn't my intention. The fog came rushing in, further inhibiting your resistance to stench.

"Hmm? Strong? I'm not quite there yet." I'd say before cutting a fart that would blow some of the mist away. It had already done its job. The smell was truly nauseating and only those with the strongest of stomachs could tolerate something like this. "Though I'm probably getting close." At this point I had gotten up but my psychic grip was still being applied. I walk over to your head and appear to lift my foot to place it on your face but I stop halfway. I easily could have ended the match by going in for the win and it seemed like I was about to do just that.

"Hmmm...huh?" I reconsider and end up not doing that. Something didn't feel quite right. As you looked up to me you could see various emotions appear on my face in quick succession. At first I seemed really vexed. Almost like I was frustrated with something. I glance over your body with my eyes, the blue glow tinting my red eyes a bright shade of violet, and then I seem lost. I absentmindedly shake the pipe blow out more mist over you. This smog a bit stickier than the last and it seemed totally different than the usual smog I had been blowing so far. I stare off into space for a moment before turning and retreating a good distance away. You could feel my grip on you loosen as my distance increases. This didn't feel quite right to you, one could only imagine, because the move seemed to indicate I was leaving to get to a safer distance. I turn around. Cheerful as ever as if I hadn't done anything out of the ordinary.

"Ahh there we go. This feels much better." My free hand was now up to face and it was glowing. The tip of my finger seemed to have a pink and blue flame. No, this didn't seem right at all. Before you could contemplate just what I was about to do I say, "Let's light things up a bit!" I bring the finger up to my 'mouth' and proceed to fire off a flamethrower at you. You immediately panic and fight against my psychic grip. You wasn't sure what was going through your mind but you manage to roll out of the direct line of fire.

It then became apparent I wasn't aiming at you anyway. Rather, the sticky fog I had blown out earlier. It immediately went up in a beautiful and bright conflagration. The burst of flame set some parts of you on fire too. Luckily your tuck and roll put most of that out leaving only a few scorch marks on you. The flames died as quickly as they had started. Only a few embers remained of the original massive burst of flames and a blackened mark on the floor the only indicator there was a fire here at all. Did I just try to end you? No, I could have but as you observed something very odd was happening. The smoke from the flames were swirling into the pipe. Including the smoke that came from your own minor burns.

"A young and smoked Dewott... I just couldn't help myself. That sounded like such a fine smell to capture." I say like it's not a big deal. I take a deep whiff of it. "Mmm... yes, I wasn't mistaken. It's perfect... I can work with this!" I say excitedly and I immediately blow a darker cloud of smoke to work with. "So that fishy smell from earlier...with a little bit of you, some of this... and that... yes." I say, molding the cloud into fish, a few other unrecognizable shapes, and then into a skull. I seemed satisfied with my creation because I fanned it away and started smoking the pipe again with the equivalent of a wide smile on my face.

"You've been a great help, Jason." I bow my head and tip my hat. "If that's all you have then I'll start working to end this match. Unless you've got more smells to show me." I say eagerly but add ominously "But I get the feeling you'd find my latest concoction to be truly, truly, disgusting." I give a soft giggle as I exhale some smoke into my hand. Testing the smell. I gave you quite a fright back there but I was back to my usual odd self.
153311111111111111111.title: Looks like it's over... wait...

1533111111111111111111.content: Still shaken up by the events that had just occurred, I try to wipe off some of the marks that the burns had caused. However, it was when I see the skull-shaped cloud that I start to get scared. "Well, if you're going to be using that 'concoction' on me, I might as well fight till I'm down!" I notice that your psychic hold was down for once, so I rush at you, waving away some of the smoky perfume with my hand. I pin you down, shoving a foot in your face.
1533111111111111111111.title: That was a scare

15331111111111111111111.content:
I was so caught up in the excitement of success and the creation of a new kind of smell that I forgot I was in a match, despite having said I'd be ending it soon. The thought of using Psychic to stop you in your tracks didn't occur to me at all! Talk about forgetting your priorities. I got what I deserved when your foot came up to my face and knocked me down to the ground. It was covering my 'mouth' [because I'm still not sure how the darn thing works. Today's just full of surprises!] and it was placed just under my massive nose. Your mad dash skid me across the ground a short distance away, ruining my coat a bit, and worst of all knocking my hat off. I whine in the lamentation of my hat. The hat had the right mind to roll off on its own as the next thing I started whining about was the smell of your feet. At least the hat took off while it had the chance.

"Mmmphf..." I wimper, not for the smell, well not entirely. Not to say it didn't smell bad. Goodness, this was one of the worst smells that you provided yet(!), but because it was sweat. Sweat's such a common smell. I notice it every day whenever I walk by others and to be perfectly frank I've grown bored of the byproduct of temperature regulation. One of these days I'm going to create an antiperspirant-aerosol hybrid, health-hazard be dam- oh I'm trailing off again! There I go forgetting priorities: These feet reek!

I grunt after having stayed there a bit longer than I should have and give the cane I still had gripped a quick twirl. After changing my grip on it and aiming it I move my knee up and lock it on the foot you didn't have rudely using my face as a doormat and then thrust my cane forward. I don't think you were quite expecting such a quick maneuver to have enough force to trip you but my aim was true. You got that cane right into your torso and that knee-lock ensured you'd lose your balance. Oh but youth is such a funny thing, you didn't fall just yet. Good coordination you had there didn't you? I use my cane to help me rise up but you were almost recovered by the time I was on my knees.

"This won't do." I say and gesture you towards me with my hand, my eyes glowing. I give you a quick psychic nudge towards me and your attempt to re-balance yourself you ended up overshooting and overcompensating. You stumble forward into my waiting arms. You gag at my body musk, which was still the same from earlier. This bearhug didn't last long as I slid my arms down and grabbed your legs and lifted you up above me, flipped you over my shoulder and kept your locked in with my cane locked against the back of your legs for support. You ended up having your face comfortably forced into my rear.

"Good thing we're around the same size. Otherwise I could never do something half as fancy." I say cheerfully and punctuate my statement with a very wrestler-esque piledriver. Your nostrils weren't faring any better than the back of your head, whose ears were now ringing from the impact, as you had your face once against stuffed in my horrid smelling rear. Things weren't looking good for you at all. It was looking like a Take 2 for a face farting. Which was in fact what I was aiming for.
15331111111111111111111.title: Quick Reversal

153311111111111111111111.content: I was just about to declare my pin, when you use your cane to hit me knock me down. After the pile driver-like move, my eyes were seeing stars and my ears were ringing from the impact of my head to the ground. I barely even had time to notice that you had sat on my face again! Struggling, I didn't have the strength to get you off, you had sapped most of it with your maneuvers and smells. Groaning, I await in horror in what you would do next.
153311111111111111111111.title: Nice Moves?

1533111111111111111111111.content:
I sigh in releif. I regard the hat that had rolled near the edge of the area. I didn't plan on having a wardrobe change for at least 2 or 3 more matches but it seems my current attire was a mess. Such perfectly good clothes ruined. Oh well.

"You could have been apart of this." I say to the hat in a wistful tone. It was a real shame it wouldn't be, I lean forward a bit and a truly powerful fart vibrates against your face and down your nostrils. I could feel you attempting to struggle but you had absolutely no leverage or way out of this one. It'd be downhill from here.

"As for you Jason, you get to be the first one to smell what I just made." I shift my bum around a bit, getting your nose in absolutely the perfect spot. "I call it 'the smell of the underworld' part one. I don't think I'm done with it yet, but(!) thanks to you I'm that much more closer to it aren't I? Savor the moment." I coo'd, almost seductively, as if this was the sort of thing one ought to enjoy. I certainly thought one should! I mean, truly, it'd be unpleasant but it was a special moment! Oh I was beating around the bush, I really should just blast the smell out already!

I grunt a bit and lean forward. The fart that bore through your nose ripped with such an intensity it sounded more like an angry (and possibly dying) tiger. The rumble, grumble, and roar of my guts quickly transitioned into a bellowing bassy fart which ended it with a wet sounding sputter. It made even me jump at how powerful that was.

"Oh my goodness! Was that me? Well then, haha." I giggle. Unfortunately for you it smelled terrible. You most certainly wished you had something to giggle about. As the hot fart almost singed and nosehairs you had, if you had any, the smell of a thousand fish markets hit you first. The smell was certaintly very meaty and it distinct burning smell to it. Almost smokey. Of course it was, given what I added to the scent cocktail. It was the epitome of a nasty fart. At least that's what I hoped it was. I take a long drag of my pipe once more and the truly raunchy farts would have a smog coming out my rear to color code each and every blast I greeted your face with.

I farted once, twice, and thrice more. Each fart was accented by the foggy mist that I had downed from the pipe. Who knew what my internal organs were like to allow something like this but it was quite the site. Smoke was coming out of my rear and puffs and burst with each squelching fart. The smoke of your torment rising up and fading away. The humidity of it all was forming on your face. Truly gross. This hellish smell was accented by the smell of your own matted face and perhaps my fluffy rear. Nobody likes the smell of wet fur. At the very least my fluffy bottom offered some comfort to your suffering face. I was of course giggling like a little girl.

"Oh how I feel young again! I'm so sorry it's at your expense, Jason. Well, not entirely sorry. This is what you signed up for after all. I'm actually quite pleased with myself!" I say cheerfully. "Now don't you pass out just yet. I've got a real big one coming soon!" I giggle again and then say in a sing song tone, "The otter has been left aghast~ Regarding my farts as quite nast'~ Soon I'll shoot a poot~ A vicious toot~ And the he'll go out with a blast!"

You were teetering in and out of consciousness but you heard enough to know something awful was coming your way. Worse than what came before it all. This match could have gone much much better for you.
1533111111111111111111111.title: Still wish I had that Hat...

15331111111111111111111111.content: Your so-called "smell of the underworld" sure did what it sounded like. After the first fart, I was almost about to vomit from the pure stench. I can't struggle at all as you blast another disgusting fart after another after another. The raunchy smell was unlike anything I've even smelled before, and that's saying something. Violently gagging to try and get the sticky fog out, I can do nothing. I could hear you saying and singing something, but I didn't hear it clearly enough. Elen was right when she said you were better than her. Teetering on the verge of unconsciousness, I just want this match to end.
15331111111111111111111111.title: Hoo boy...

153311111111111111111111111.content:
"Now for 'smell of the underworld' part two!" I declare triumphantly. "Oh right, I haven't made that yet. Just accept the finale of part one then." I say, sounding legitimately disappointed that I didn't have every smell I wanted. One match at a time I suppose! For now though, I already had myself prepped up for the big one that was coming. I start taking long drags from my Pipe, building up the pressure. You could feel the next wave in the form of pressure bulging against your nose. You dared not think exactly why that was. It was much better to try not to think about it too much. Much like how one tries not think about how fast the oncoming train might be moving and what would happen if they slipped and fell in its wa-

Oh I'm so morbid! And trailing off again! Here it comes!

I lean back and the pressure was released all at once. To the audience, and probably everyone within a mile, could feel. The force I should say. The explosion of a fart was as devastating as it was comical to watch. It started out as a resounding explosion and ended in the low typical rumble of a massive fart. Complete with a pink mushroom shaped cloud. The shockwave could be felt throughout the arena and initially no one was sure if this was supposed to happen. Quite a few wondered if I spontaneously exploded.

Because no one would put that sort of thing past me at this point.

I don't think you could comment on the smell. I reckon you were passed out from the force alone before the smell even registered. A minor set back. You'd probably smell it when you were up an about again. I'm sure I singed a few sinuses with that one. Wonderful I'm sure! Smell is truly a wonderful thing, I'd tell myself.

I had gotten up and walked out of the now dissipating shroud of pink, my cane absolutely necessary at the moment. I was rubbing my bum and mumbling, "Oh, went too far, can't be doing that. Blech, my hip!" because, after all, even I'm not suited for that sort of thing. Sure quite a few would be shocked to see us both OK after that. It was only a fart I'd tell them if I could. If anyone asked how I did that, I'd just tell them "Science and Magic" because that's really what I've been doing to be able to manage that. On the way out I pick up my traitorous hat, the one that rolled off just when things were getting good, and dust it off. After inspecting its ruined state I inspect my black coat and 'tsk'. It was in tatters from the stunt I just pulled.

"Wardrobe change for sure. Oh well, into the fire they go with the rest." I fling my hat and coat off igniting them with the very hand I tossed them with. They reduced to ash within seconds and scattered by the winds. Of course I'd always remember the poor outfit. Every time the wind blows I'd get a whiff of the ash and remember this battle. Things were achieved but I still had places to go and things to smell and do. I chuckle and make my way out heading presumably to a store to buy clothes.

The match was declared a victory for me. You awoke with a sense of leftover dread and an awful smell in your nose that you couldn't seem to get out for the longest time. You couldn't even describe what it smelled like for it was too obscure now. In a way, you were glad you could not.
153311111111111111111111111.title: Performance Over

15332.content:
1. Name: Gilly Species: Goodra

2. Gender: Female

3.Character Description:

Gilly is a large Goodra with a big heart, and an even bigger gas problem. She got that way mostly by spending her time alone in the woods, releasing her gas in several farts and burps. What seemed to be a little annoying to the Goodra suddenly became a cute little hobby she did every now and then. Of course, the inhabitants of the forest Gilly lived around weren't happy one bit with her outbursts, but that didn't stop her from gassing away as she pleases.. She does have a tendency to stop whenever an unwilling victim has had enough and she even won't do it on purpose to torture someone. In fact, she even promised to herself to never commit any violence of any kind... Until now. Of course, she won't go out and murder other Pokemon with her musk, but she'll at least give 'em a good stinking before apologizing and promising to help her opponents get clean again.

She's only won once so far (against a champion!), but she's very eager to win more matches..

4. Stink Stats:

Feet: Bad
Farts: Rancid (but can also smell Good from time to time..)
Body Musk: Pretty Bad
Butt (Without Farting): Very Bad
Breath: Very bad

5. Stink Resistance: (65/100)

6. Special Abilities:

Great Gas Bubbles of Stink: With enough practice, the Goodra managed to make a bubble burst from her rump and be able to encase someone inside of it, before making the bubble hard and filling it with horrible fumes. The bubble soon will pop however and the Goodra ends up making her breath go down to Slightly Bad when she preforms this feat.

Sweet Smellody: Having way too much time on her hands, Gilly figured out how to make her toots sound like a soothing lullaby to put someone to sleep for a bit. The only downside is that her farts will become Good for a long period of time, mainly smelling of grapes.

Big, Belchy Bang: Using all her might, the Goodra can belch violently for about a minute. Once she uses this though, her Farts and Breath stats will fall to Bad.

-Dual Wield: Due to constantly observing Jason's shells, Aqua was able to replicate and copy Jason's shells, making one for each of his holsters on either side of his body. Name: (nickname) Gassy
Species: Rapidash
Gender: M

I am a large Humanoid Rapidash, I use my overwhelming strength and muscle mass, specifically in my hind legs, to over power my enemies and force them into a corner, where typically they tap out after a few humiliating farts to their face convinces them that they are no match for me.

Feet: Slightly Bad, as hooves pick up little debris off the ground, however powerful knockout weapons.
Farts: Between Bad and Pretty Bad, but high volume due to the nature of my large size.
Body Musk: Slightly Bad, but gets worse as a fight continues.
Butt: Pretty Bad, not that I don't wash, but by the time I step into the ring, its not so pleasant.
Breath: Slightly Bad, I brush regularly, but do not use toothpaste as it is a figment of the liberal media to convince us to buy useless appliances and pastes.
Stink Resistance: 27/100, as I am a horse, I have a rather large nose and my nostrils run deep, so I am sensitive to smells, however my mindset and my will at any moment can cause my actual resistance to be much higher, as I am a muscle bound horse, I am not likely to put up with stink, or being humiliated for too long before a special ability kicks in.

Special Abilities: Hysterical Strength
Hysterical Strength I cannot control, it happens during a fight or flight response, such as moments of fear, or moments of extreme rage, being humiliated increases the chances of this occurring. My strength is increased 3 fold as my brain allows control of entire muscles, as to the standard 33%, but enough science. At this point I can usually break out of any bounds or holds that may be frustrating me, or overpower my foes, it all depends on the variables of the engagement however. If I am unable to break free, this ability looks more like a big hissy fit and I imagine would be amusing, however I have never had this ability let me down.

Incineration
I concentrate my gas to use my burning tail to let out a rancid flaming fart, the damage dealt depends on the foe I am facing and their defence against flame. This ability takes a while to build up, as currently my gas is not concentrated enough to burn unless I have had time to concentrate it. Which also means I cannot use this move for at least 3 turns after farting.

The way I wage battle is truly unique and my origins are a mystery. I'm cute on the outside but absolutely nasty on the inside. This statement is literal as well. Underneath my polite and nice exterior outside of battle lies the cruelty of the fairies of old tales. Why am I like this? That's a story for another time. I'm also adept at actual battles, not that such a thing matters as much here, but be aware of potential mind-games and advanced plays typical of a seasoned fighter.

Because of the way I wage combat, my strongest stenches are produced internally to avoid conflict with my unique fragrant defenses. Despite what the stats say there's no actual body musk here and there doesn't need to be either.

Feet: Slightly Bad
Farts: Deadly
Body Musk: Slightly Bad
Butt: Slightly Bad
Breath: Unbearable (See #6)

#6. Special Abilities

The Pipe: Between my previous victory and arrival here I've perfected a unique fairy magic. An upgrade to the previous Odd Perfume special ability. I can conjure an ethereal and ghostly pipe that I smoke and huff out various fragrances and fogs. It also lets me add some 'flavor' to my breath and much like the Odd Perfume ability before it I can use it to shroud myself in a cloud of perfumes, fragrances, and smells that have strange physical effects on those around me. What makes it so much better now is that I can actively modify my veil of aromas. You most likely will be physically affected by these truly strange smells.
