Surrounded in a thin translucent pink mist and a cute smile that masks my eagerness I personally challenge Tammy!
1553221.title: Mysterious Challenger

15532211.content: Smiling and waving to the assembled crowds I lumber into the arena feeling quietly confident. My towering authority was dimmed somewhat in light of my previous fight result but I was determined now to save some face by putting down the new champ. In truth I hadn't heard much about you other then your stinks were abnormal. Simply taking it that you were just a strong opponent I felt confident that my foul farts would soon have you under. Taking my place in the centre of the arena I awaited your arrival. Unlike most champions I had never bothered getting myself a throne as I found it a little too presumptuous. I preferred to end the match with a throne then start one. The only other thing I really knew was that you were a fairy type. While others probably would have scoffed about that I knew first hand not to underestimate opponents. There would be no mercy shown today
15532211.title: Tammy vs Elen

155322111.content:
My arrival was preceded by a thick, pink, fog that travelled across the ground like a rapidly rising tide. I made my entrance as the creeping mist carpeted the ground. Slowly descending my hover to meet the mist, stirring it but not by much, I landed near the edge of the ring. Or did I land? Thick was the heavy pink fog, you couldn't tell if I had landed or had simply become buoyant on the pink blanket. A long, lavender, pipe materialized between my lips and it appeared to be of made of the stuff now flooding the arena except it was of a much more darker hue. At this point the fog had reached up to your ankles and now fully blanketed the arena.

I took a long inhale from the pipe and slowly breathed out a thick pink cloud. It enveloped me for only a moment as it thickened beside of me. As if to cement the possibility I could have been resting on the mist I then reclined on it. Though you might not have had a throne I had the gall to set up my own right in front of you! The cute smile I had on my face made it difficult to gauge if this had been done with the intention to upstage you or not.

Before any one could question if I had unfairly made a first move the mist didn't seem to have a scent at all. The mist was recognizable as the move Misty Terrain. That posed more questions than answers as that is not a move Togekiss normally learns.

"Hello, Tammy." I said in a sweet tone after having made an entrance more fitting for an Aromatisse than a Togekiss. "Don't mind the misty terrain. I was just eager to flex my new toy." I blow a puff of smoke with my ethereal pipe. "I can make quite the spectacle with it you see!" I give a lighthearted chuckle at my own antics. My eyes quickly scan you over from afar. Sensing neither fear or overconfidence I smirked.

"I get the feeling you're going to be an interesting one. I wasn't wrong to challenge you." My initial cheerfulness taking any icy tone as I said that. I broke into an unsettling chuckle. "Hmmm," My cheerfulness returns as I play with the cloud I was reclining on by fluffing it up, "I guess the game's already begun, so let's get the show on the road!" With first impressions made the match could begin.
155322111.title: An elegant entrance

1553221111.content: I raise an eyebrow at the somewhat ominous mist rolling across the arena. I figure if it was an attack already it would be called out as against the rules. proudly I stand my ground as the curious mist washes across the floor towards me though I look decidedly unimpressed. In my time as champion I had dealt with all manner of strange skills and abilities. This would be no different. Refusing to let your arrogance irritate me I call back "oh? and you are?" In truth I knew who you were but it couldn't hurt to tease you a little in return. "its all very pretty and all" I continue as I take on a fighting pose "but I prefer the colour green don't you?" I finish saying just as I force out a fart of enormous proportions. it blasts out from beneath me and spreads out across the floor blowing your Misty terrain away with it. the wave of green stench rushes across the floor spreading to rapidly towards you
1553221111.title: You're given the first move!

15532211111.content:
The oncoming green didn't even make me flinch. I simply took a deep breath through my pipe. The misty terrain provided little resistance to the sheer force of your fart. I stopped reclining on the cloud as it was blown away. Despite the fart having reached me I seemed completely unaffected! It was revealed in the aftermath that I wasn't actually buoyant on the mist. I had my feet firmly planted on the ground. I look at my devastated misty terrain, the thick fog having piled and clumped at the edges of the arena. I finally exhale through my nose and deliberately drag it out to show you why I had been spared of the stench. Streams of lavender smoke flowed out of my nostrils. It seemed my special power had many creative applications.

"Ahhh," I sigh in relief. "I'm Elen of course." I hop up and twirl upwards a bit higher leaving the stench below to dissipate. "But, oh my, did you do that just now to spite me?" I laughed. I blow a few thick clouds off to the edge of the arena, as if decorating the pink fog at the edge with a cloud snowman of sorts. "You shouldn't waste your energy like that. You're going to need every bit of it!" I say in a sinister tone.

I take a long drag from my pipe. My chest was puffing up by the end of it and after a brief moment to let the implications sink in I blew out a large, billowing, lavender cloud. This one was directed towards you and it was quickly approaching. The potential for it to be a threat while also blocking your view of me provided you with a decision to make. Do you worry more about me or the cloud approaching you? You don't even know where I could be hiding at this point and that cloud didn't look as friendly as the mist before.
15532211111.title: Dancing with the Fog

155322111111.content: Watching my wave of green swiftly approach you I was rather surprised to see you pass it off like nothing until I realise why you were safe. "so.. the pipe then" I mutter to myself before returning my focus to you as you speak again. As your voice takes on a more ominous tone I prepare myself. I look on indignant as you send the pale cloud towards me. "Don't you underestimate me!" I yell in reply before spinning around swiftly and blasting out another enormous jet of gas from my backside, the sheer force of the emission sends it it ripping through your attack. Turning around again just as fast I begin to scan the oddly coloured battlefield, the pinks intermixing with my own foul farts as I search for you.
155322111111.title: Your response to this?

1553221111111.content:
You had blown away the oncoming cloud and all but 1 of the patches of misty terrain I had set down below. It didn't take long for the fog to stir. I quickly pop out of it and stretch my wings. I shoot a very smug expression at you.

"Oh? Were you looking for me?" I say in a teasing tone. Having dematerialized my pipe vanishing like the ghostly thing it was I shot up into the air giggling. My flight arcs downward heading towards you at an alarming speed. My mobility was notable and seen in a previous match, and rather than approach you from the front the entire time I had weaved a bit to the side and shuttle looped upwards and back down to you. My movements were as elegant as they were hard to follow. You lost track of me for a brief moment but that wouldn't be a problem for long. A giggle from your left preceded a sweep of my wings to the backs of your legs that impacted with enough force to knock you onto your bum and nearly on your back. You felt something impact your chest and press you down onto your back. It was none of then me having forced myself on top of you. I was starting to turn around to give you my rear. This was quickly going downhill for you until you heard and felt your static activate.

"Huh?" I had a confused expression as my next move was stiffened by the paralysis. A brief look of shock and surprise appears on my face as I quickly attempt to fly away. Fearing I might not be able to I start hopping away, starting by hopping off of you. Fearing that too might not be enough to avoid a counterattack I start conjuring my ethereal pipe, presumably to heal myself or give myself cover fire. Or even both!

Despite what had happened I had a smirk and determined expression on my face. I was one tricky and wary fighter but would it be enough to escape?
1553221111111.title: Trickery

15532211111111.content:
Your surprise attack caught me rather off guard and i crashed onto my backside. feeling you land atop me I grunt out in irritation before you begin to spin around. the strange heady scent from your body was already curling its way into my nose and it made me feel strangely sick. Once again however you were underestimating me as I charge up my static and send a pulse of it into your body.

while it doesn't paralyse you completely I'm content to see your confused expression as you dart away. rising back to my feet I decide to take this on the offensive. despite my body size I was astonishingly fast as I dash at you, a hand gripping your wing as I drag you rather unceremoniously to the floor. "gotcha you damn pigeon" I growl out in success as one of my rank filthy feet pins you underfoot. Holding you there I prepare to charge my static once more "oh the things I'm gonna do to you little pigeon... I'll show you how a TRUE champion fights!"
15532211111111.title: What a Mistake!

155322111111111.content:
Without showing fear I blow out the smoky mist I had breathed in and let it waft up to you. Rather than having healed my paralysis I took an unorthodox approach to getting out of this mess I was seemingly in. The smell wasn't too pungent but it had a rather overpowering feel to it. You were reminded of forests, but not healthy or thriving forests. The puff of smoke I exhaled and let waft up to you smelled of a dead and decaying forest. That distinct smell of a burned forest, the ash having settled, and rain saturating it all over the course of days and weeks. This smell penetrated your nose and reached all the way into your head. It left you with a feeling of unease and had you generally uncomfortable. When your focus returned you also noticed your feet's pressure had dwindled and I had nearly slipped out despite the paralysis. Unfortunately for me I was too paralyzed to truly get away from this awkward position just yet.

So your focus took a blow. I've proven to be dangerous even when I'm not at an advantage. I had produced more mist and I started getting enveloped it, presumably as an attempt to aromatherapy away the paralysis.

"Li-likening a f-fairy to a pigeon!? Wh-who do you think you are!? You g-glorified li-... livestock!" An icy tone glazed every word with the last one being especially emphasized. Though... something seemed off about this entire situation. You couldn't quite place your finger on it. Were my spots wrong? Was I always this menacing? Something was definitely different about me. A sense of wrongness hung in the air like the now currently forming fog despite you clearly being superior in this situation. One could reason it was probably the fog I was making. It was known to mess with your head. Speaking of which, I had enshrouded myself in one out of self defense just now. That could prove problematic. You had to steel your will to keep going as my struggling was quickly proving to soon set me free. It was a good indication that the paralysis was petering out despite your persistent static.

"When I get out you're going wish I was a mere pigeon!" When I said this most of the bitterness was gone but determination had soon filled in the missing gaps.The audience was cheering both of us on. Our mutually driven fighting spirits having inspired the audience to start taking sides rather than passively enjoying it.
155322111111111.title: Rising Tensions

1553221111111111.content: my passive ability seemed to be struggling to affect you. This alone was pretty impressive. shaking my head to clear the strange sense of unease your gas had set upon me I placed my hands together and actively focused hard on creating a heavy static field. Sending the electrical current to my foot I jolted it through you, amplifying the chances of paralysis affecting you five fold. "You said when you get out... I think you mean if..." i reply swivelling on the foot not currently pressing you to the floor. Facing away from you now I have a fairly clear shot at your body as I let loose a putrid smelling fart less then a metre from you. "get a wiff of that pigeon. I'll be making sure you get to smell it plenty!"
1553221111111111.title: Things are Interesting now!

choices: On top you are for now
15532211111111111.content:
The paralysis took effect again, fighting back the healing my aromatherapy could bring out. Perhaps I was particularly weak to paralysis and electricity, being part flying type. I didn't have time to think about it for too long as I took a powerful blast that stripped me of my foggy armor. I still had the perfumes I bathed in to somewhat dampen the blow but it wasn't enough at all. I let out a high pitched whine as I was hit with the stench that sharply contrasted the menace I displayed earlier.

It smelled sulfuric: a smell I wasn't too fond of. It reminded me fire and poison and those were two things I was inherently weak to. Not even considering the fact that it smelled atrocious and it was easy to see why the blast would illicit such a whine from me. I reflexively start using my ghostly pipe to try to escape the misery I was in, producing yet more pink mist as I breathed it in and out. Sadly, this tool could only go so far when it came to masking smells. I had to get away if I truly wanted to be safe again. Away to where the stench could be more diluted more easily.

Some in the crowd was cheering for me despite the circumstances. It was true, it was way too early for you to have such a dominance over me! Luckily I had a plan for escape, one that I didn't want to use. As I endured the gas you had blasted me with I planned each and every step, my struggles proving to be completely ineffective as I plotted my escape. I was out of remarks at this point, so I remained under you silently until I'd find my golden opportunity. I was forced to endure the torture you'd be putting me through.
15532211111111111.title: Stunning Power

choices: you had better get out quick...otherwise...
155322111111111111.content: "Nothin to say huh?" I jeer down at you as I let off another foul smelling fart "guess your all sight and no stink huh pigeon?" I laugh aloud as I decide to up the stench, taking a seat directly on your face. My foot was off you for barely a second before my ass hits home, settling your nose snugly between my cheeks. Sadly for you those cheeks too are capable of inflicting my static field. looks like things are getting worse and worse for you. "your pretty comfy down there. Despite all your insults I might just give you the honour of being my personal little stink sniffer"
155322111111111111.title: ascending the throne

1553221111111111111.content:
I shoot a glare at you as you continue to keep mock me only to let out another cute whine when I got blasted again. I had every intention of escaping soon, and the decision to do was sped up when you took a seat on me. Things were indeed not looking good for me, admittedly. I mentally shook my head. The method of which I'd escape wouldn't be very fun.

From where you sat you saw my body writhe in agony for a split second. It wasn't a surprise, after all, you had quite the atrocious rear. What happened next was a shock to all that were watching, including you. A glowing image of me came out of the one you were sitting on, solidifying back into me. For a brief moment there were two of me! The one you were sitting on, and the one that was now hovering before you. Before you could register this, the one you were sitting on deflated for a split second then burst into a Misty Terrain. Your rear quickly met the ground and you felt it to be covered in a sticky substance. Perhaps perfume?

The Misty terrain quickly spread I had left you in a large patch of one. I used my astonishing agility to blind side you yet again. This was a different approach than the first, You felt my teeth sink into your tail and left it up over your head. This pushed you forward onto your stomach and then onto your face. Your back was contorted painfully and your rear was pointing up towards the sky. You saw two feet land on the ground in front of your face and a rear plant itself in your view.

"Hmph!" I huff, I had been panting before that. I had tucked your tail under one of my wings to let me talk. "I can't believe you made me do that." You reflexively shot a static to stun me again. However, it failed this time. "Not gonna cut it this time. Misty Terrain prevents your nasty status conditions for those on the ground. It's a good thing I opened up with Misty Terrain when I appeared, otherwise I wouldn't have known your only method for dispersing it. Everything beyond that point was me testing to see what other tricks you had up your sleeve." It was now my rear that was settling your nose in unfortunate places leaving you with a sense of foreboding.

"I bet you're wondering what I just did. That was the move Substitute. A very unusual and painful move to do." I sighed. "Though, it let me turn the tables really quickly!" I say cheerfully. A sinister smirk quickly formed in place of my genuine smile. "And now the matter of punishing you for your mockery!"

A bassy fart ripped across your face. It was heavily muffled for those observing us but you felt it full force. It was far from a pleasant smell and actually brought you back to the forest from earlier. Now not only were the trees decaying but so was every other living thing for it smelled like something had crawled up into me and died. I let out two more tiny ones after that one in quick succession. This was an actual stench now. For you escape would be even more difficult, as your strongest offense was aimed in the wrong direction and you were in a position where you had no leverage. Your back muscles weren't the best in the world as an Ampharos either. I had you very effectively pinned and you had to smell everything I had to offer.

And not only did it smell, but it hurt. The situation was pretty bleak all of the sudden.
1553221111111111111.title: Reversal

15532211111111111111.content: feeling like I had the fight in the bag I relaxed somewhat as I planned to just gas you out. that error would be my undoing as your curious technique took me completely by surprise. I had heard of such a move but never had I actually seen it performed. Before I could snap out of it a sharp pain in my tail brought me back to my senses as I was unceremoniously hoisted upwards. my face met the ground rather sharply and I saw stars. by the time I managed to shake it off your potent backside planted itself into my view. unable to stop you I was forced to endure your foul farts. they were nothing like anything I had ever smelt. the very core of your foul gas made me want to escape desperately but from my compromising position there was little I could do.
15532211111111111111.title: The Tide has Turned

155322111111111111111.content:
Ever the menace and threat I was aware of most of your escape options and was being wary. I'd lean forward, putting even more painful pressure on your spine as I blasted fart after fart down your nostrils. This was an ideal opportunity for me and I intended to milk it. With my mouth free I'd keep a thick Misty Terrain with my ghostly pipe. While it kept me safe from your paralyzing static it would also provide a thick fog for you to breath in in between my farts.

The sensations were overwhelming. Every other second I'd blast a warm and humid fart. You could hear and feel every rip that came out of my rear in all their glory. Occasionally they'd bubble out, and you'd feel the sickening humidity build up and promise you a lingering stench for a time to come. Each one smelled slightly different than the one before. It could be because of the fog, but each fart smelled of death with some strange peculiar scent mixed in with it. Each fart would teeter between the smell of death and the smell of garbage with the scents accented with varying fragrant smells. You'd think it'd help things but it made it more sickening. It would be like spraying strawberry air freshener to mask the smell of a fish market.

When you weren't smelling farts you were getting a lungful of the oppressive fog that blanketed the ground around your head. It wasn't particularly smelly, but it wasn't particularly good. It was like a very, very, strong perfume, and every breath of it was sickly sweet. I seemed to like it, as I would occasionally take a refreshing whiff of it between my bombardments.

"What a champion you are." I said with a sneer. With my sharp tongue having made a return I then say. "To have lasted so long in such a disgraceful position. Why, I'd sooner have died of embarrassment than the stench. So what do you call this technique? Pigeon shears Sheep?" I giggle and unleash a series of potent farts. They sounded like a growling bear and were as strong as one as well. Each eggy blast tossed up some of the pink mist, illustrating the force of each blast. Not enough would be tossed up to offer you any reprieve from your torment unfortunately. "Great name for a great technique. It suits you like a new coat of fleece." I continue to mock you.

You were at a veritable boundary of heaven and hell, and I was enjoying every bit of it.
155322111111111111111.title: Heaven and Hell?

1553221111111111111111.content:
It didn't seem to matter how I pulled or stretched or writhed. No matter what I did I could evade your foul gas. the smell was seriously getting to me and there was nothing I could do to stop it. With nothing left for me to do but suck up your farts I wail slightly beneath you. the smell was truly overpowering me and I felt myself getting weaker by the second.

cursing you, myself and the damn organisers of the tournament I am left with nothing to do but smell your disgusting aroma's. my static was useless, any gas I expelled was immediately covered by your own and I was for all intents and purposes, helpless. pretty soon I wouldn't even be able to fight back. you had me exactly where you wanted me.
1553221111111111111111.title: How Awful

15532211111111111111111.content:
As you felt your fighting spirits drain quickly I continued to monologue. "You know, I actually kinda liked you." The thick miasma of suffocating fumes and of course my rear prevented you from answering, but it didn't stop me from pretending as if you did answer.

"No really, I did. Well, keyword being 'did'. You're a joke at this point." I sneer and bomb your face with another blast of a fart. At this point they penetrated any defenses you had against stench and actually made you cringe reflexively. "I mean you were strong in both mind, body, and ego. Though when I saw how easy it was to strip away your power I'm beginning to think you have no real power. You only won because your opponents were weak! Go figure!" I continued to be a heel. This riled up the crowd and perhaps your anger a bit too. I cut above any boo's with a roar of a fart. I could feel every muscle in your contorted back stiffening from this.

"I guess some in the crowd are angry. I guess that's what happens when you take their champions, the ones they look up to, and trounce them. Grind them into the ground without and respect." I chuckle and start grinding my rear in your face to emphasize the last part of my statement. "Look at how much I care about them."

This was a humiliating experience for you, I imagined. I know that when it seems I get an advantage my mouth runs as fast as rotting cheese. It probably smelled like it too and if it did it was infinitely more preferable to the treatment you were getting now. I smirk at that. I wanted you to suffer. I enjoyed every bit of the torment I was dishing out. It oddly felt right despite the inherently benevolent nature of my species.

"Oh if only you were stronger. Perhaps in future matches you might be able to Mega Evolve. Your static is useless against a lot of things anyway." I said, lamenting for you. Heaven knows there was plenty for you to lament about as it is. "For now though, I suppose it'll be the end for you. I've been saving an especially bad fart just for you, you should feel honored!" I contort your back even more painfully to keep you even more restrained.

"In fact, it's a technique I've been working on. A 'Coup De Grace' if you will. I do hope you enjoy it, I've worked especially hard on it." There was a dead silence. All noise had died down during this pause. It appeared nothing had happened. However, everyone would start noticing the pink fog turning a more sickly purple. It started where I had pinned you down and cascaded outward rapidly. Everyone in the audience was thrown into fits of coughing and hacking. Whatever had happened, the sickly sweet fog from before was now a just plain sickly. While one could feel sorry for the audience, woe was you who was at the center of it all.

Your mind was in shambles. With a single silent fart the fog now matched the scent of the previous gaseous bombardment from before. Only now, it penetrated your mind as well as your nose. There was no longer the rank and disgusting smell of dying forest working its way into your nose. Now it was just the dying part. The unholy smell of things being cooked alive in a fire invaded and offended your very being through your nostrils. You felt your mind and grip on reality slipping. This smell was becoming your world and reality and the surrounded environment almost seemed to change. It felt almost as if you were dreaming. What you saw was what you smelled. You could picture it clear as day. You saw a massive bonfire in a long dead forest, cold unfeeling eyes glowing in the darkness as unidentifiable bodies upon bodies were shoveled into the fire. It was almost surreal. You felt sickened by it, luckily for you the humidity of my fart reminded you it wasn't real. You were still pinned ungraciously under me suffering from the bizarre effects of my stench.

"You know smells are closely linked to memories right? It's always been a dream of mine to share experiences through smell alone. Oh if only I could truly recapture the horrors I've seen and smelled before. One should know the bliss and terror of it. It's truly a sublime experience." I monologue. Not that you could really focus on my words at all. "That is why I became a perfume maker, to share a horror only I would remember at this point. Isn't it just terrible? The smell of rot and death? The smell of suffering?"

My ravings were bordering on madness, I chuckle at this realization. "I suppose there's more than a few things wrong with me. But it feels so right! I do hope you forgive me." I was sure you would, maybe, after I stopped turning your reality upside down with my bizarre smells. Though, now staying conscious in this suffocating stench would prove difficult. Focusing on getting away even more so. Your consciousness was indeed slipping now. Would this be the end? Would this hell claim you?
15532211111111111111111.title: Secret

155322111111111111111111.content:
after a while I literally couldn't struggle anymore. my eyes fluttered as my consciousness faded. with little else to do I cursed your name one last time and passed out.

you win (sorry about the lame finish ¬¬ )
155322111111111111111111.title: Can Tammy escape from this?

15532221.content:
Swabs (Whimsicott)

Male

I am Swabs, a huge fan of Tammy! After seeing her get beat down too many times I decided to challenge her. I'm an easy win BUT I also have something for her future battles. A Mega Stone! Not just any mega stone, Ampharosite! Aside from that, nothing else is remarkable about me. I know I'm going to get demolished but hey, at least I'll get demolished by one of my favorite champions!

Feet: Unscented
Farts Unscented
Body Musk: Unscented
Butt: Unscented
Breath: Unscented

Stink Resistance 0/100

Is being fluffy and cute a special ability? If so I have that in spades!

So with mega stone in hand I'll be offering it to Tammy at the very start of the fight.
15532221.title: Fan Blessing

155322211.content: I was in a foul mood until I heard I had a challenger today. It was just what I needed to vent on to cheer myself up. And so.a few hours later I was lounging on my chair as you entered the arena. At first my mood fell a few frames as I think my match had been cancelled. "Don't tell me someone pulled out?" I call to you As you walk on mistaking you for a worker here. There was no way someone so completely weak would challenge me right?
155322211.title: Punching Bag and Present!

1553222111.content:
Shaking my head quickly and cheerfully say "Nope!" I skip over to the arena and pull out a curious looking sphere from my cotton. "I am here to give you a present and let you try it out. It's a mega stone... for Ampharos!" Excitement creeping into my voice. "With this you'll be stronger and fluffier! Kinda like me." I said fluffing my cotton up. "Well, except I'm not very strong. I'm pretty darn cute though!"

I walk up to you and place the stone on the ground in front of you before heading back to my spot. "Maybe after the match I can get an autograph?" I ask from afar. You seemed pretty surprised by all this as all of this was in every sense out of the blue. "Don't worry, it's not a trick! I promise! I'm really just a huge fan of ya!" I chirruped.
1553222111.title: Fluffy Admirer

15532221111.content: Despite what you said I was still more then a little suspicious. You didn't get to be a champion if you weren't. Curiously I look at the stone. Not a lot of what you had said made much sense to me. Megavoloution was still a new thing and it wasn't something I had heard nor seen having not watched busters matches. Still you sounded so exited about something and people DID come in purely for the chance to be abused sometimes. Looking back at you I give you a sceptical look. "So hol up a second there. Yer tellin me you came all tha way here just to give me this stone... then what? If you give someone summat they get to keep it but what's in it for you? Lemmi guess.... your some stink pervert who's lookin to be abused and humiliated huh?"
15532221111.title: Begin?

155322211111.content:
"I really am a fan!" I cry out, blushing profusely. "I mean, I really am a fan of you. I saw you lose and wanting my favorite champion to win I decided to get her something." I said cheerfully pointing at the stone. You didn't seem convinced though, as I was merely repeating myself from earlier. There was a pause and my eyes shifted around, uncomfortable in the silence.

I let out a sigh. "Ok, so maybe that last part did have something to do with it... maybe." I even looked a little embarrassed after having had to admit that. "I mean, I'm not even a champion. I wouldn't stand a chance." I said, somewhat crestfallen. "Oh well, at least I'm darn cute aren't I?" I said, excitement and cheer returning. "So go ahead and try out your new toys!" I showed no signs of putting up a fight as I waited for you to use the gift I gave you.

I was practically offering myself to you and you had a shiny new mega stone to try out. Whether I put up a fight or not things could get spectacular with a new form under your belt.
155322211111.title: Caught

1553222111111.content: I gave you a long look trying to figure you out. I really couldn't tell if you were genuine and wanted what was beat for me or were.just trying to be clever. I knew I had fans but none that had ever bothered to so much as talk to me let alone go so far to help me. Thinking hard for a moment more I finally sigh. "Alright short stuff.... here's the deal... if this works the way you say it does and I become mad powerful then that's great... but I don't really want to forcibly torture someone who has helped me so I'll let you chose what I do to you. If it doesn't however...... I'll be subjecting you to torment so foul that you'll wish you had never been born..... we clear?" I ask not waiting for an answer I bent down and placed a hand on the stone. White light filled the arena.
1553222111111.title: Begin!

15532221111111.content:
"Of course!" I say, agreeing to it.

It took a bit of concentration to draw out this power, but you could feel it coursing through you, in fact, it was already within you prior to touching the stone. All it was doing was unlocking it for the time being. As you embraced it the white light quickly spawned arcs of white energy that swirled around you. The familiar ecstasy of evolving was present and you felt it as your body changed rapidly. Your horns curled and extended and you grew some of your old sheep fleece from evolutions prior. 155332212221.content:
1. Daode (Gallade)

2. Male.

3. An honorable warrior, Daode fights simply to keep his skills sharp. He spent the majority of his life mastering martial arts. Upon reaching maturity Daode went on a spiritual pilgrimage on a mystic mountain. Unfortunately, the only food on the mountain were extremely bitter berries. Two years of eating nothing but these berries gave Daode unbelievable breath, to the point where his dojo evicted him. Daode now wanders, simply trying to find a new purpose in life.

4. Stink Stats.
Feet: Bad.
Farts: Slightly Bad.
Body Musk: Bad.
Butt (Without farting): Slightly bad.
Breath: Horrid

5. Stink Resistance: 50/100 (Resistant to breath.)

6. Special abilities (and weaknesses):

1. Mover of Mountains: Whilst not being too resistant to stink, Daode is living weapon. His fighting skills are peerless, he has been dedicating his life to mastering several techniques and stances for offensive, defensive and evasive capabilities. Obviously his strength is impressive, and his speed and reaction times are formidable.

2. Body fluency: Part of Daode's training was learning to read body language, and he has some ability to read opponents emotions and predict their movements.

3. Outcast: Not a special ability, but it's notable that most of Daode's social interactions have been in combat or lessons. (Not to mention his years of isolation.) So Daode is socially inept, but naturally trusting of others. As a result, he can be manipulated, tricked or persuaded somewhat easily.

She grew up as the youngest of six sisters, all of whom had some pretty rank foot odor, but before she even became a Pikachu, Rena's nasty digits were fouler than all of her sisters, not only that, but her breath, farts, and body odor were also extremely foul. After defeating Tammy the Ampharos and becoming a champion, her rancid feet pushed new boundaries, her other smells following suit. And even though most pokemon can't stand to be near her, she's still quite the socialite and is actually pretty nice.

4. Stink stats
Feet: Deadly (x6)
Farts: Deadly
Body Musk: Deadly (x2)
Butt (Without Farting): Ungodly
Breath: Deadly

5. Stink resistance

75/100

6. Any special abilities

Static Wave: Rena can paralyze victims with her own specially made electric attack. It does no physical damage, is well ranged, and never misses. It can also affect types that normally resist electricity based paralysis. However, it does require time and focus to charge.

Foot funk: In addition to being some of the foulest feet the tournament has ever seen, Rena's feet are coated with all manner of dirt and grime. Not only that, but the smell alone can stun you, if you don't pass out that is.

So, ready to get a whiff of the nastiest feet in the stink tournament league?

155332222212222.content:
1. Barry the Pichu

2. Male

3. Barry has always had some major gas issues in many ways. As he was growing up, this of course cause all manner of issues, mostly in the form of having a difficult time making friends due to his varying levels of stench. He is still young however and was searching for his lot in life when he heard about a pokemon tournament for smelly pokemon. Though it felt a little degrading, he figured that he might as well give it a shot, if anything, to turn that stink of his into something useful.

Barry is a friendly pokemon and wants to be friends with everyone, even those he battles. He also values fun above all else and doesn't mind losing, even congratulating his opponent. He is willing to do rematches though, no matter how badly he's been beaten. He actually feels kin of bad about winning sometimes because he figures his opponent might be upset, still, he understands that a contest is a contest and will try to win regardless, so long as his opponent shows no signs of being upset. e's also relatively inexperienced with allot of things and tends to make mistakes or hesitate.

Champion Status!: after defeating Jason with a seemingly endless wave of charged Gas, he became a champion. Barry wasn't exactly thrilled that his prize was the ability to become smellier, but after seeing some of the other champions he might be facing, he changed his mind rather quickly. not only that, but he also sought ways to improve his game using his electric abilities.

His stink is notable that, although extremely powerful, it serves as a massive double edged sword. Think of him as basically a little stink bomb, full of potential!... and gas...

4. Feet: Slightly bad - Deadly x10

Farts: Slightly bad - Deadly x10

Body Musk: Slightly bad - Deadlyx10

Butt (without farting): Slightly bad - Deadly x10

Breath: Slightly bad - Deadly x10

5. Stink Resistance: 50 out of 100

6. Abilities:

- Upgraded Charge: Barry gradually builds up more and more gas as time goes on starting at about "Slightly bad" levels and gradually increasing to "Deadly x10". with every increase of gas, his body reacts in kind as the stink inside him begins to pour out all over, even without farting. As a result, the more gas he has, the stinkier it is, and the stinkier he his. This also increases the duration of his farts, from 10 seconds at the weakest level to 10 minutes at the highest. The level of has he has stored is identifiable by looking at his belly, which bloats out more as gas builds up.

There are a few drawback here however. Before becoming a champion, if Barry began to fart at any point, he would be unable to stop it. now he is able to salvage some of his gas through focusing and catching the rest. still, he can loose allot more gas than he would like to this way. Wile farting, he has a very hard time moving around, especially with the higher volumes of gas provided by high stink levels. He can be made to fart early with enough pressure applied to his belly. He is also rather ticklish and tickling him while he has allot of gas stored can cause him to start farting. after farting, his stink level will decline until he is either emptied of gas, or manages to hold the rest in, which causes him to have to charge up again. He can burp effectively without issue at any charge level, but it's not as effective as his farts. As his belly bloats more towards the latter levels of power, he begins to have trouble moving due to the size of his gut, all the way to near immobility at the highest charge. Though he has finally trained himself to be able to handle his gas better, he still has trouble handling it at the higher charge levels as he smells so bad, that he begins to start knocking himself out. At the absolute highest level of Deadly X10" he has only a 30% chance of not knocking himself out with it.

- Electrical Charge: Barry has acquired a wide number of powerful electrical tricks that feed off of his charge of electricity. This charge builds up over time and is necessary for those moves. He is also able to absorb electricity from electric opponents and attacks to charge himself.

A Drawback to this ability is the fact that if his electrical charge is too high, he will involuntarily begin to static cling to his opponents.

- Heightened Range: As Barry builds up more and more gas and his stink increases, so does the range of it. In fact, at higher stench levels, it is entirely possible for him to knock his opponent out without being near them, or even having to fart at them. The smell is weakest at the edge of it's radius but get's much more potent the closer an opponent gets to him. His farts also gain increased range and volume over time as well.

- Stink Boost: When being exposed to and assaulted by the stink of others, Barry's body reacts interestingly by causing him to produce gas faster and increase his charge rate. The longer he is exposed to it and the more powerful the stink, the faster the rate increases.

The drawback to this however is, if an opponent is aware of the negative aspects of his charge, this can be used to exploit it more effectively. It is still a risky move on their part though.

- Manual boost: With his time in the tournament, Barry has learned how to charge himself by straining his stomach. the buildup starts out quickly but becomes less effective at levels past "Rancid". he can also charge his electricity in a similar fashion.

- Gas control: Barry has learned how to adjust the volume of gas he releases which can range from an overwhelming area choking blowout or an agonizingly slow and torturous stream.

- Agility: In order to build up his charge, Barry typically tries to avoid combat by speeding around and evading attacks. He can typically keep this up, even at mild levels of bloat, but it's effectiveness decreased gradually as he bloats more, eventually being unable to use this at higher charge levels.

- Squirmy: Though a great pleasure for opponents, Barry's squirminess makes him rather good at escaping holds and pins. Certain holds and pins can become harder to escape from when he becomes more bloated.

- Clingy: Barry is good at climbing onto larger opponents and holding on to points that matter, meaning opponents may have to forcefully try to remove him off of them.

- Volt Dash: Barry has learned to use his electricity to provide a quick dash to escape opponents.

- Stinging Shock: If Barry finds himself in a reasonably difficult pin, he will release stinging waves of electricity against his opponents in an effort to get them off.

- Static Cling: Barry uses his electricity to create a static cling onto his opponents and make himself extremely difficult to remove. He will often use this to aid in stink deliveries of various sorts. The effectiveness of the cling is enhanced by the amount of fur or hair an opponent has.

- Friendship!: If Barry likes you he will offer his services in your matches. in short, he will allow you to use him as a weapon by hanging your at the edge of the arena, out of the way. When you are ready to use him, pick him up and give him a squeeze onto your opponent. It would be against the rules for him to actively fight. Rubbing him onto the opponent can make him cling to them.

- Aftermath: When defeated, and after being knocked out, Barry inadvertently retaliates as his body blasts out all of the gas inside him. At higher levels of charge, it is easily capable of knocking out his opponent, especially at "Deadly x10" level.



I walk towards the gate marking the entrance to the arena, my expression forlorn. I've participated in very few matches recently, having gone months even. However, fan demand to see the Champion Pichu sparked Mr.Huge to personally address me, arranging a match for me in a week down the line. Unfortunately, I never did acquire that Everstone, and intentionally loosing a match is a foolish move in this place, depending on who my opponent is. Of course, having a week of stress, I had plenty of time to think... Too much actually. After coming to some realizations, I thought to look a bit more into the community, whereas I've usually been too nervous to wanna spend much time out of the safety of my room.

One thing I discovered in this time though was allot of Raichus joining the tournament, all part of a big family. Sure, they didn't seem to get along too much, but they were still family. I've been so distant from mine since coming here, and in reality, I've met only a couple people here that seem nice, but I don't talk to them much either. maybe I should leave this place and try returning home... then again, with how I smell now, I'd probably only cause even more problems.

I halt before passing though the gate, trying to clear my head of all lamentation. I know I can't afford to win this match, but, depending on who I'm fighting, I might not be able to afford to loose either. I hold my head as too much thought bounces around in it. I should just go out there, and see what happens.

I finally pass through the gate to the cheers of the fans who requested my return. Where normally, even if I'd get a little self conscious, I'd at least be flattered, even if I'm just a novelty. Instead, I feel sick as I make my way past them. Despite how slow I was getting to the gate, I don't see anyone here yet. am I early?

"Hey!" I say, "you must be Barry! That little Pichu champion I've heard about. Well it's always nice to meet another friendly face around here. My name's Rena, in case you didn't know, and I look forward to seeing if you're really as strong as they say!"

If there's anything I can do to make you feel better, just name it cutie!" You look up at my frienldu, smiling face and say...

Again, I aint to thrilled at the idea of letting you down, but I can feel it in my bones. I'm not even sure I can get half way through the match without evolving. So, look inside? I don't see how that would do anything. still, instead of just going over to shove my face into it I look down to it. Suddenly, my eyes open wide as I feel my body suddenly take control on it's own. After all, many of these people were some of the ones demanding to see me fight, and they certainly weren't getting that like this. 155332222222121.content:
#1. Elen (Togekiss)

#2. Female

#3. True to my name's origin I am a rather fragrant individual. I work with perfumes and harsh chemicals for cleaning homes. As such, I am no stranger to strong scents and I'm recently a new champion! Beware the fog and miasma of strange smells I shroud myself in! It's back and are better than ever. The way I wage battle is truly unique and my origins are a mystery. I'm cute on the outside but absolutely nasty on the inside. This statement is literal as well. Underneath my polite and nice exterior outside of battle lies the cruelty of the fairies of old tales. Why am I like this? That's a story for another time. I'm also adept at actual battles, not that such a thing matters as much here, but be aware of potential mind-games and advanced plays typical of a seasoned fighter.

Because of the way I wage combat, my strongest stenches are produced internally to avoid conflict with my unique fragrant defenses. Despite what the stats say there's no actual body musk here and there doesn't need to be either.

I tend to come and go in this tournament. One never knows where I might pop up next and who I might be challenging.

#4. Stats
Feet: Slightly Bad
Farts: Deadly
Body Musk: Slightly Bad
Butt: Slightly Bad
Breath: Unbearable (See #6)

#5. Stink Resistance: 100*/100 (Unique Defensive Techniques)

#6. Special Abilities

The Pipe: I've perfected a unique fairy magic. An upgrade to the previous Odd Perfume special ability. I can conjure an ethereal and ghostly pipe that I smoke and huff out various fragrances and fogs. It also lets me add some 'flavor' to my breath and much like the Odd Perfume ability before it I can use it to shroud myself in a cloud of perfumes, fragrances, and smells that have strange physical effects on those around me. What makes it so much better now is that I can actively modify my veil of aromas. You most likely will be physically affected by these truly strange smells. In short, this lends me the superb defenses and a way to mess with one's head.

It's also pretty stylish.


Pleased to meet you Neku.

That gave the impression that I was actually rather sweet with me saying that. Then things took a darker turn. "And the more all out I go, the harder I fight, the more fun I have." A not so friendly smile said it all.

I then took a slow and deliberate bow in midair. "And thank you! It's flattering that you'd think I'm hardy enough to train." Upon raising my eyes back up to look at you there was a noticeable glare. "But I'm afraid you're mistaken. You've underestimated my level of experience." Just in case you couldn't read between the lines I decided to add "I've long, long, finished any training I'd have needed at this point." I giggle, and to you that giggle just didn't feel right.

The perfumes seemed to be having an effect on you already, without having even conjured my pipe for the heavy artillery. I size you up from afar and snicker. "You're almost not mundane. For having an affinity to magic and having psychic powers you're marginally less boring than the my previous opponents. I'll give you that much." I said in a heavily condescending tone. 2. Male

Feet: Deadly ( x6 )
Farts: Deadly ( x6)
Body Musk: Deadly ( x6 )
Butt (Without Farting): Deadly ( x6 )
Breath: Deadly ( x8)

6. Any special abilities:

Flames: Being a Charmeleon, Raunch can also control fire.

Intimidating Aura: The daunting stench and overconfident demeanor can shrink the conference of the most seasoned stinker

Dragon Breath: Not the kind of fiery breath you hear about in the stories, this kind burns, but in a different way. In addition to being the nastiest smell on the planet, once it enters your nose, it doesn't come back out. The putrid stench just stays there, festering in your nasal cavity. 155332222222221.title: Make way for the foulest pokemon alive!

1553322222222211.content:
1. Jason (Dewott)

2. Male

3. Brave but sadistic at some times, I was adopted at a young age by 2 different Pokemon. My mother was just a normal pokemon, but my father, however, was a former smelly Pokemon Tournament champion. He taught and trained me all about this tournament and how to fight using my stench. He sadly passed on a while ago, but I carry on his legacy. My main weapons are my farts, but I have a wide arsenal of other stinks to use on my opponent. In fact, when I say "my farts are bad", In reality, my farts could probably knock very small pokemon out in one blast. My only weak point is that I have a soft side, and show mercy a lot.

4. Stink Stats
Feet: Pretty Bad
Farts: Deadly x2
Body Musk: Pretty Bad
Butt (without farting): Ungodly
Breath: Unbearable

5. Stink Resistance: 90/100

6. Special Abilities
-As I fight, I start to sweat, which makes me stink more. Therefore, my feet and body musk go up 1 level as I battle.

-Stinky Shell: as you may know, all Oshawott and its evolved forms all have a shell used for combat. I'm no different, but my shell is a bit more rounded. I can use this by burping, breathing, or farting into it, then thrusting it into my opponents nose and holding it there so they get the full smell.

-Gassy Ice Prison (only used as a last resort or finisher): This move was created by me. I encase both me and the enemy in a spherical ice dome. I then fill it almost to the top with water. I can then fart continuously in there. Of course, I'm a water-type, so I can stay underwater. As for my opponent however, they can either drown or they can surface to the top and breathe my farts. I can choose to be merciful and let them out at any time, or I can just wait until they faint.

I gasp as I immediately enter the arena. I had just entered, and you smelled awful! For once, I'm actually scared to fight someone!

That done, she unwound her plan, creating a Psychic type gym to lure in humans. In a couple months she amassed a dozen slaves, but when the unofficial gym was spotted, she was busted by the police, her slaves were taken, but Faye escaped into a forest, where she found an entire civilisation of pokemon, and the smelly pokemon tournament.

Faye is beginning a new life. She can't stand the stink really, but there are plenty of handsome pokemon she can add to her cause, this time in the guise of creating a "Book Club". But she realizes in order to do that, she'll have to enter the tournament. Faye will put on a friendly facade while slowly manipulating her opponent into compromising situations, subverting their owns thoughts.

Farts: Putrid
Body Musk: Horrid
Butt (Without Farting): Unbearable
Breath: Ungodlly

Surface Telepathy: Faye can read surface thoughts to help her within the fight.

Suggestion: While Faye can use traditional hypnosis, she prefers to use her own method of "suggestion" to hide her intentions while brainwashing. She puts psychic influence on certain words when speaking to create influence.

Drain Kiss: In case of emergencies, Faye can use a powerful Drain Kiss to weaken her opponents.

Weak: She's a girl used to the good life, and as such isn't experienced with hard work or training, making her quite physically weak.

[UPDATED AS OF JULY 14, 2016]

1. Spectrum (Kecleon)

2. Male

3. A champion and natural-born thief by heart, there was one and only one reason that Spectrum joined the tournament: to gain fame and riches. He loves messing around with his opponents, whether it be sneaking at them from behind, or just plain turning invisible and messing with them. Once defeating Shiver, he became a champion, and his already toxic feet became even more smelly! He also won the fame he wanted so badly. Frankly, it felt good. Now, he fights to earn all the money he wants. You should be ready for a tough fight when facing this sneaky, mischievous little Kecleon!

4. Stink Stats
Feet: Deadly x4
Farts: Pretty Bad
Body Musk: Putrid
Butt (Without Farting): Unbearable
Breath: Deadly

5. Stink Resistance
(70 out of 100)

6. Special Abilities
-Invisibility: Spectrum can use a Kecleon's natural ability to get closer, hide from his opponents, or sneak in for an attack via turning completely invisible. He can only do this for a limited time however, and the more he uses it, the slightly more visible he becomes, to the point where you can fully see him.

-Thief: Spectrum can use this skill, coupled with his invisibility, to steal any items that the opponent may happen to have, whether it be some kind of Berry, an item, a magic wand, literally ANYTHING!

Color Change: Spectrum's ability allows him to adapt to stink much more easily. Once exposed to one stink for too long, he becomes acclimated to that specific stink and gains a +25 stink resistance boost to that specific stink. The only way to get around it is have 2 or more stinks at your disposal. Otherwise, it's going to be really tough to beat him.

Butt: Between Unbearable and Ungodly, as a slave I was not permitted to wash as a part of my training, it did not go so well for my scent.
Breath: Ungodly, I brush regularly, but do not use toothpaste as it is a figment of the liberal media to convince us to buy useless appliances and pastes. I have taken much stink to the mouth through my mistresses training, it has caused my breath to be nearly as bad as her farts.
Stink Resistance: 67/100, as I am a horse, I have a rather large nose and my nostrils run deep, so I am sensitive to smells, however my mindset and my will at any moment can cause my actual resistance to be much higher, as I am a muscle bound horse, I am not likely to put up with stink, or being humiliated for too long before a special ability kicks in, my stink resistance has went up over 40 points since I lost to my master and have been trained by them, however I do not deal with stinks too well.

Special Abilities: Hysterical Strength
Hysterical Strength I cannot control, it happens during a fight or flight response, such as moments of fear, or moments of extreme rage, being humiliated, especially by an enemies butt, increases the chances of this occurring. My strength is increased 3 fold as my brain allows control of entire muscles, as to the standard 33%, but enough science. At this point I can usually break out of any bounds or holds that may be frustrating me, or overpower my foes, it all depends on the variables of the engagement however. If I am unable to break free, this ability looks more like a big hissy fit and I imagine would be amusing, however I have never had this ability let me down.

Incineration
I concentrate my gas to use my burning tail to let out a rancid flaming fart, the damage dealt depends on the foe I am facing and their defence against flame. This ability takes a while to build up, as currently my gas is not concentrated enough to burn unless I have had time to concentrate it. Which also means I cannot use this move for at least 3 turns after farting.

Fire Breath

After being exposed to much stink training at the hands of my master, my breath has become so foul that by utilizing my flame control; I am able to ignite it and cause a stream of green flames, I can use this to take down aerial targets as I hit them from afar and singe their feathers, disabling flight; or to melt incoming ice attacks and humidify incoming water attacks.

15533222222222223231.content:
1. Daode (Gallade)

2. Male.

3. An honorable warrior, blessed with a horrible breath from an exclusive diet of bitter mountain berries. I scraped a victory against Jason, so I've been honing my smells to make me the most formidable champion yet. I may be a new champion, but it's already starting to go to my head and I'm becoming much more...cruel.

4. Stink Stats.
Feet: Unbearable
Farts: Rancid.
Body Musk: Ungodly.
Butt (Without farting): Very Bad.
Breath: Deadly (x2)

5. Stink Resistance: 75/100 (Resistant to breath. Weak to feet)

6. Special abilities (and weaknesses):

1. Mover of Mountains: Daode is a living weapon. His fighting skills are peerless, he has been dedicating his life to mastering several techniques and stances for offensive, defensive and evasive capabilities. Obviously his strength is impressive, and his speed and reaction times are formidable.

2. Body fluency: Part of Daode's training was learning to read body language, and he has some ability to read opponents emotions and predict their movements.

3. Outcast: Not a special ability, but it's notable that most of Daode's social interactions have been in combat or lessons. (Not to mention his years of isolation.) So Daode is socially inept, but naturally trusting of others. As a result, he can be manipulated, tricked or persuaded somewhat easily
15533222222222223231.title: Champion.

155332222222222232311.content:
1. Jason (Dewott)

2. Male

3. Brave but sadistic at some times, I was adopted at a young age by 2 different Pokemon. My mother was just a normal pokemon, but my father, however, was a former smelly Pokemon Tournament champion. He taught and trained me all about this tournament and how to fight using my stench. He sadly passed on a while ago, but I carry on his legacy as a champion. My main weapons are my farts, but I have a wide arsenal of other stinks to use on my opponent. In fact, when I say "my farts are bad", In reality, my farts could probably knock very small pokemon out in one blast. My only weak point is that I still haven't gotten over my merciful side. I have a brother, but I won't even say his name, he likes to keep it classified. He is known only as "Bro" or "Brother".

4. Stink Stats
Feet: Ungodly
Farts: Deadly x5
Body Musk: Putrid
Butt (without farting): Deadly
Breath: Ungodly

5. Stink Resistance: 65/100

6. Special Abilities
-Sacrifice: A brand new ability as of one of his battles, I basically sacrifice defense for offense. By focusing my energy I can lower my resistance all the way to zero, but all my stats will go up by either one or two levels. I can only use it when I get mad or agitated, however

-Stinky Shell v2.0: as you may know, all Oshawott and its evolved forms all have a shell used for combat. I'm no different, but my shell is a bit more rounded. I can use this by burping, breathing, or farting into it, then thrusting it into my opponents nose and holding it there so they get the full smell. After defeating Shiver, I remodeled my shell so it can store smells inside of it.

-Gassy Ice Prison (only used as a last resort): This move was created by me. I encase both me and the enemy in a spherical ice dome. I then fill it almost to the top with water. I can then fart continuously in there. Of course, I'm a water-type, so I can stay underwater. As for my opponent however, they can either drown or they can surface to the top and breathe my farts. I can choose to be merciful and let them out at any time, or I can just wait until they faint.

Walking in with a huge evil grin, I say in a singsong voice "I'm baaaack!"

3. A Staraptor that just loves to torture pokemon with his smells. His size and somewhat fast speed allow him to quickly pin down his opponents and force his stench on them. However, as he grew up with siblings which all had horrible breath, he became traumatized and it became his weakness. Hearing about the tournament, he decides to join and rack up a few wins (and maybe even get a slave).

4. Stink Stats
Feet (Talons): Ungodly
Farts: Slightly Bad
Body Musk: Putrid
Butt (Without Farting): Pretty Bad
Breath: Unbearable
Wings: Ungodly

5. Stink Resistance: (70 out of 100) [Weak to Breath]

6.Special Abilities

Stink Tornado - Gale is able to trap his opponents in a tornado by flapping his wings as hard as he can and maybe breathing or farting in it. This tires him out however, so he can't use it very often. He can also flap his wings to send a single gust of stink at his opponent.

Early Trauma - As a child, his siblings all tortured him with their breath. His stink resistance will cut in half if he is attacked by breath.

Flight - He can fly. There's not much to say about this skill.

I fly in, landing on the other side of the arena, ready to fight my first battle in the tournament. The crowds roars, the slight smell in the air, it was great. Looking at you, I say "Well, I guess you're my opponent."

15533222222222223231221.content:
1. Name: Gilly Species: Goodra

2. Gender: Female

3.Character Description:

Gilly is a large Goodra with a big heart, and an even bigger gas problem. She got that way mostly by spending her time alone in the woods, releasing her gas in several farts and burps. What seemed to be a little annoying to the Goodra suddenly became a cute little hobby she did every now and then. Of course, the inhabitants of the forest Gilly lived around weren't happy one bit with her outbursts, but that didn't stop her from gassing away as she pleases.. She does have a tendency to stop whenever an unwilling victim has had enough and she even won't do it on purpose to torture someone. In fact, she even promised to herself to never commit any violence of any kind... Until now. Of course, she won't go out and murder other Pokemon with her musk, but she'll at least give 'em a good stinking before apologizing and promising to help her opponents get clean again.

She's only won once (against a champion!) and lost twice, but she's very eager to win more matches..

4. Stink Stats:

Feet: Bad
Farts: Rancid (but can also smell Good from time to time..)
Body Musk: Pretty Bad
Butt (Without Farting): Very Bad
Breath: Very bad

5. Stink Resistance: (65/100)

6. Special Abilities:

Great Gas Bubbles of Stink: With enough practice, the Goodra managed to make a bubble burst from her rump and be able to encase someone inside of it, before making the bubble hard and filling it with horrible fumes. The bubble soon will pop however and the Goodra ends up making her breath go down to Slightly Bad when she preforms this feat.

Sweet Smellody: Having way too much time on her hands, Gilly figured out how to make her toots sound like a soothing lullaby to put someone to sleep for a bit. The only downside is that her farts will become Good for a long period of time, mainly smelling of grapes.

Big, Belchy Bang: Using all her might, the Goodra can belch violently for about a minute. Once she uses this though, her Farts and Breath stats will fall to Bad.

155332222222222232322212222.content:
1. Name: Gilly Species: Goodra

2. Gender: Female

3.Character Description:

Gilly is a large Goodra with a big heart, and an even bigger gas problem. She got that way mostly by spending her time alone in the woods, releasing her gas in several farts and burps. What seemed to be a little annoying to the Goodra suddenly became a cute little hobby she did every now and then. Of course, the inhabitants of the forest Gilly lived around weren't happy one bit with her outbursts, but that didn't stop her from gassing away as she pleases.. She does have a tendency to stop whenever an unwilling victim has had enough and she even won't do it on purpose to torture someone. In fact, she even promised to herself to never commit any violence of any kind... Until now. Of course, she won't go out and murder other Pokemon with her musk, but she'll at least give 'em a good stinking before apologizing and promising to help her opponents get clean again.

She's only won once so far (against a champion!), but she's very eager to win more matches..

4. Stink Stats:

Feet: Unscented
Farts: Rancid (but can also smell Good from time to time..)
Body Musk: Pretty Bad
Butt (Without Farting): Very Bad
Breath: Very bad

5. Stink Resistance: (65/100)

6. Special Abilities:

Great Gas Bubbles of Stink: With enough practice, the Goodra managed to make a bubble burst from her rump and be able to encase someone inside of it, before making the bubble hard and filling it with horrible fumes. The bubble soon will pop however and the Goodra ends up making her breath go down to Slightly Bad when she preforms this feat.

Sweet Smellody: Having way too much time on her hands, Gilly figured out how to make her toots sound like a soothing lullaby to put someone to sleep for a bit. The only downside is that her farts will become Good for a long period of time, mainly smelling of grapes.

Big, Belchy Bang: Using all her might, the Goodra can belch violently for about a minute. Once she uses this though, her Farts and Breath stats will fall to Bad.

155332222222222232322222221.content:
Species: Buizel
Name: Bui
Gender: Male
Character description: A feral with some sentiments. On a hunting run, a group of Skuntank found the little fellow. The idea flew around to just eat him, but then again there really wasn't enough to go around. In the end the group decided to take in the small Buizel, and raise him as one of them.
Bui was given to the two nastiest males in the tribe, being as they couldn't make their own child. It was hard at first for Bui, the smells, the musk. He couldn't even snuggle with his parents at night without grimacing and whining all night. Eventually, his father took him out to the woods to train his nose. They went out for several days and night. His adoptive father made sure Bui knew he loved him before what he did after that. The father forced his son onto the ground, and laid on him. The Bui had nothing to do, but to sniff his dad for days on end. His father would pass gas, and just make him sniff it in. Bui constantly had tears in his eyes, though he hardened over time. By the end of the 10th day, he was used to the smell. Every part of his fathers body was on his nose till he was used to it.
Bui came home with his dad with his head held high. The first thing he did when he got back? Snuggled with the two parents that had loved him since they found him. He liked the smell.
Now he was at this tournament for the pure fun and bliss of it all.

Butt: Deadly(x3)
Breath: Bad

Charming- While overwhelming unpleasant, he's still got a heart of gold. He's got the looks to boot~

1. Jason (Dewott)

2. Male

3. Brave but sadistic at some times, I was adopted at a young age by 2 different Pokemon. My mother was just a normal pokemon, but my father, however, was a former smelly Pokemon Tournament champion. He taught and trained me all about this tournament and how to fight using my stench. He sadly passed on a while ago, but I carry on his legacy as a champion. My main weapons are my farts, but I have a wide arsenal of other stinks to use on my opponent. In fact, when I say "my farts are bad", In reality, my farts could probably knock very small pokemon out in one blast. My only weak point is that I still haven't gotten over my merciful side. I have a brother, but I won't even say his name, he likes to keep it classified. He is known only as "Bro" or "Brother".

4. Stink Stats
Feet: Ungodly
Farts: Deadly x5
Body Musk: Putrid
Butt (without farting): Deadly
Breath: Ungodly

5. Stink Resistance: 65/100

6. Special Abilities
-Sacrifice: A brand new ability as of one of his battles, I basically sacrifice defense for offense. By focusing my energy I can lower my resistance all the way to zero, but all my stats will go up by either one or two levels. I can only use it when I get mad or agitated, however

-Stinky Shell v2.0: as you may know, all Oshawott and its evolved forms all have a shell used for combat. I'm no different, but my shell is a bit more rounded. I can use this by burping, breathing, or farting into it, then thrusting it into my opponents nose and holding it there so they get the full smell. After defeating Shiver, I remodeled my shell so it can store smells inside of it.

-Gassy Ice Prison (only used as a last resort): This move was created by me. I encase both me and the enemy in a spherical ice dome. I then fill it almost to the top with water. I can then fart continuously in there. Of course, I'm a water-type, so I can stay underwater. As for my opponent however, they can either drown or they can surface to the top and breathe my farts. I can choose to be merciful and let them out at any time, or I can just wait until they faint.

You hear someone familiar say "Now, how about that rematch I promised you when you became a champ?" You see a Dewott walk in, twirling a shell. "Don't expect me to go easy at all this time." I smirk, getting ready in the corner of the ring.

1. Lee (Hitmontop)

2. Male

3. A fighter from afar, he seeks new challenges after his old rivals all gave up, partly due to his fighting skills, and partly due to his toxic-smelling feet. After wandering for a long while, he discovered this "tournament" and decided to give it a try. Agile and powerful, he's a force to be reckoned with. Despite his seemingly tough side, he's actually pretty nice if you get to know him. He became a champ (and found a friend) after easily besting Daode, and is now looking for even tougher opponents to challenge.

4. Stink Stats
Feet: Deadly x3
Farts: Unscented
Body Musk: Deadly
Butt (Without Farting): Rancid
Breath: Pretty Bad

5. Stink Resistance: 85 out of 100

6. Special Abilities

Spin Cycle: By spinning fast enough on his head or arms and creating wind with his spinning feet, Lee can create a small whirlwind that traps the opponent in a foul gust. The only drawback is that it lasts a short time, and afterwards Lee becomes dizzy and has to regain his composure. Close up, this move can be devastating, as the opponent is kicked multiple times in a row with his grimy, cheesy feet.

True Spirit: As a fighter, his confidence and spirit can grant him a lot of stamina, agility, and strength when he needs to use it. This also slightly boosts his stink resistance when in trouble. However, this ability is completely disabled unless he absolutely needs to use it.
155332222222222232322222222331.title: Lee the Hitmontop

155332222222222232322222222332.content:
1. Barry the Pichu (more like pee U!)

2. Male

3. Barry has always had some major gas issues in many ways. As he was growing up, this of course cause all manner of issues, mostly in the form of having a difficult time making friends due to his varying levels of stench. He is still young however and was searching for his lot in life when he heard about a pokemon tournament for smelly pokemon. Though it felt a little degrading, he figured that he might as well give it a shot, if anything, to turn that stink of his into something useful.

Barry is a friendly pokemon and wants to be friends with everyone, even those he battles. He also values fun above all else and doesn't mind losing, even congratulating his opponent. He is willing to do rematches though, no matter how badly he's been beaten. He actually feels kin of bad about winning sometimes because he figures his opponent might be upset, still, he understands that a contest is a contest and will try to win regardless, so long as his opponent shows no signs of being upset. e's also relatively inexperienced with allot of things and tends to make mistakes or hesitate.

Champion Status!: after defeating Jason with a seemingly endless wave of charged Gas, he became a champion. Barry wasn't exactly thrilled that his prize was the ability to become smellier, but after seeing some of the other champions he might be facing, he changed his mind rather quickly. not only that, but he also sought ways to improve his game using his electric abilities.

His stink is notable that, although extremely powerful, it serves as a massive double edged sword. Think of him as basically a little stink bomb, full of potential!... and gas...

4. Feet: Slightly bad - Deadly x10

Farts: Slightly bad - Deadly x10

Body Musk: Slightly bad - Deadlyx10

Butt (without farting): Slightly bad - Deadly x10

Breath: Slightly bad - Deadly x10

5. Stink Resistance: 50 out of 100

6. Abilities:

- Upgraded Charge: Barry gradually builds up more and more gas as time goes on starting at about "Slightly bad" levels and gradually increasing to "Deadly x10". with every increase of gas, his body reacts in kind as the stink inside him begins to pour out all over, even without farting. As a result, the more gas he has, the stinkier it is, and the stinkier he his. This also increases the duration of his farts, from 10 seconds at the weakest level to 10 minutes at the highest. The level of has he has stored is identifiable by looking at his belly, which bloats out more as gas builds up.

There are a few drawback here however. Before becoming a champion, if Barry began to fart at any point, he would be unable to stop it. now he is able to salvage some of his gas through focusing and catching the rest. still, he can loose allot more gas than he would like to this way. Wile farting, he has a very hard time moving around, especially with the higher volumes of gas provided by high stink levels. He can be made to fart early with enough pressure applied to his belly. He is also rather ticklish and tickling him while he has allot of gas stored can cause him to start farting. after farting, his stink level will decline until he is either emptied of gas, or manages to hold the rest in, which causes him to have to charge up again. He can burp effectively without issue at any charge level, but it's not as effective as his farts. As his belly bloats more towards the latter levels of power, he begins to have trouble moving due to the size of his gut, all the way to near immobility at the highest charge. Though he has finally trained himself to be able to handle his gas better, he still has trouble handling it at the higher charge levels as he smells so bad, that he begins to start knocking himself out. At the absolute highest level of Deadly X10" he has only a 30% chance of not knocking himself out with it.

- Electrical Charge: Barry has acquired a wide number of powerful electrical tricks that feed off of his charge of electricity. This charge builds up over time and is necessary for those moves. He is also able to absorb electricity from electric opponents and attacks to charge himself.

A Drawback to this ability is the fact that if his electrical charge is too high, he will involuntarily begin to static cling to his opponents.

- Heightened Range: As Barry builds up more and more gas and his stink increases, so does the range of it. In fact, at higher stench levels, it is entirely possible for him to knock his opponent out without being near them, or even having to fart at them. The smell is weakest at the edge of it's radius but get's much more potent the closer an opponent gets to him. His farts also gain increased range and volume over time as well.

- Stink Boost: When being exposed to and assaulted by the stink of others, Barry's body reacts interestingly by causing him to produce gas faster and increase his charge rate. The longer he is exposed to it and the more powerful the stink, the faster the rate increases.

The drawback to this however is, if an opponent is aware of the negative aspects of his charge, this can be used to exploit it more effectively. It is still a risky move on their part though.

- Manual boost: With his time in the tournament, Barry has learned how to charge himself by straining his stomach. the buildup starts out quickly but becomes less effective at levels past "Rancid". he can also charge his electricity in a similar fashion.

- Gas control: Barry has learned how to adjust the volume of gas he releases which can range from an overwhelming area choking blowout or an agonizingly slow and torturous stream.

- Agility: In order to build up his charge, Barry typically tries to avoid combat by speeding around and evading attacks. He can typically keep this up, even at mild levels of bloat, but it's effectiveness decreased gradually as he bloats more, eventually being unable to use this at higher charge levels.

- Squirmy: Though a great pleasure for opponents, Barry's squirminess makes him rather good at escaping holds and pins. Certain holds and pins can become harder to escape from when he becomes more bloated.

- Clingy: Barry is good at climbing onto larger opponents and holding on to points that matter, meaning opponents may have to forcefully try to remove him off of them.

- Volt Dash: Barry has learned to use his electricity to provide a quick dash to escape opponents.

- Stinging Shock: If Barry finds himself in a reasonably difficult pin, he will release stinging waves of electricity against his opponents in an effort to get them off.

- Static Cling: Barry uses his electricity to create a static cling onto his opponents and make himself extremely difficult to remove. He will often use this to aid in stink deliveries of various sorts. The effectiveness of the cling is enhanced by the amount of fur or hair an opponent has.

- Friendhip!: If Barry likes you he will offer his services in your matches. in short, he will allow you to use him as a weapon by hanging your at the edge of the arena, out of the way. When you are ready to use him, pick him up and give him a squeeze onto your opponent. It would be against the rules for him to actively fight. Rubbing him onto the opponent can make him cling to them.

- Aftermath: When defeated, and after being knocked out, Barry inadvertently retaliates as his body blasts out all of the gas inside him. At higher levels of charge, it is easily capable of knocking out his opponent, especially at "Deadly x10" level.

anyway, that should be about it. now, let us throw down!... or just stink at each other.
