1553322222222222323222222223331.content:
1. Victor Huge (Toxicroak)

2. Male

3. Victor Huge (or Mr.Huge as he likes to be called) is one of the largest businesspokemon in the world, he owns Titus and Lucius's agencies and studios, large amounts of real estate and most of all, his tech company. He was even one of the large backers for creating the stink society. And with the company fully consolidated, Mr.Huge can now focus on relaxing, having some fun. A cruel, piggish man who at first glance seems like an arrogant fool. However, it's purely a front for his darker, more calculating side. He didn't achieve his fortune for no reason. He will tend to play softly at first, and wear his opponent down until he knows he can win. Secretly, he does have an agenda in fighting, to find a worthy successor to his fortune. After defeating Shiver, he became a champion.

4. Stink Stats

Feet: Deadly x 3
Farts: Deadly
Body Musk: Deadly x 2
Butt: Deadly
Breath: Deadly x 2
Poison Gunk: Deadly x 4
Clothes: Deadly

Stink Resistance: 95/100

6. Special Abilities

Poison Gunk: A thick liquid Mr.Huge can spit from his wrist spikes or mouth. They will stick to whatever they touch. If they touch the skin of an opponent it will slowly drain their stink resistance, as well as being horridly stinky.

Clothes: Mr.Huge is a man of style. He will begin every fight in a full tuxedo suit. Until he takes it off, all stinks (except poison gunk) will stay as the smell of his clothes.

Savant: Despite his brutish and lusty nature, he is very strong willed and intelligent.

Dulling poison: His mouth can create a toxin that, if in contact with skin, dulls the senses and makes their opponents, move and react slower, and make it harder to think properly.
1553322222222222323222222223331.title: Mr. Victor Huge!

choices: I hear you've been asking my brothers about me
15533222222222223232222222233311.content:
1. Lavinia Gaiathorn (Roserade)

2. Female

3. The older sister of Titus and Lucius, and one of the few pokemon in the world considered better looking than her brothers. Though while she is extremely beautiful, she's also quite cruel. The three siblings lived in high-class society their whole lives, but while Titus and Lucius were busy living the good life, Lavinia had other ideas. She would constantly seduce wealthy men and then use them for her own pleasure for experimenting with various pollens, or even for stink torture before using a unique power of hers to make them forget it ever happened. Lavinia cares little about the lives of others except when they concern her, but she does have a bit of a soft spot (if someone like her even has one) for her baby brothers. Unfortunately, that soft spot had to take a small break as she defeated her favorite baby brother for her champion tittle.


4. Stink Stats

Feet: Can be Deadly x8 or Good
Farts: Deadly x4
Body Musk: Good
Butt: Good
Breath: Deadly x8 only when kissing. Otherwise Good.
Rose Pollen: Can be either Good or Deadly x15

Stink Resistance: 55/100

6. Special Abilities

Plantmaster: Lavinia is just as good at, if not better than Titus at controlling all kinds of flora for use in combat or otherwise.

Pollinator: From her rose-like hands, Lavinia can create all sorts of pollen clouds. From ones that paralyze, to ones that smell heavenly, to ones that cause hallucinations, to ones that reek to high heaven!

Gorgeous: As to be expected of one who shares the Gaiathorn name, Lavinia is drop-dead gorgeous, and can easily seduce almost any male or female, even some that don't swing her way!

Hypnotic: An interesting ability that she doesn't share with her brothers. Lavinia's piercing red eyes can hypnotize and entrance pokemon if they look into them long enough. Twenty seconds is enough to make subtle suggestions while generally two minutes of eye-contact is required to completely hypnotize someone, though it can take longer if the pokemon has a strong will and actively resists.

Rosy: Lavinia's body secretes a rosy scent that masks the awful smell of her dainty feet. She can turn it off and on at will.

Kiss of Death: While her breath is normally minty fresh, any pokemon lucky (or foolish) enough to lock lips with her is in for a nasty surprise.

Burning anyone who decides to look for too long. It's enough to make my pouch swell and I laugh. "Haugh! Finally came to see what you've been missing my dear? Let me kiss your hand..." I hop over to you, bearing over your smaller, more delicate body, my hands cautiously wrap around your hand as I kneel down to kiss.

And I've heard that you've had Titus do unspeakable things to keep his modeling career alive. Though I must admit, you're a fair bit more attractive than most men I've seduced. But that ghastly smell! We'll have to do something about that. "A pleasure to meet you kind sir. Now, if you would allow me to have the first move, I would be ever so grateful." 15533222222222223232222222233321.content:
Name: Cyan (Zorua) (champion)
Gender: Female
Brief character description: Cyan is an innocent looking zorua, yet do not let her defenseless appearance fool you, she was nicknamed as "Stunky" by her friends for two reasons, First being the cyan colored stripe on her fur that went all the way from her head to her tail making her look like a skunk, and second was the fact that her gas was incredibly foul. to the point they convinced her to join this tournament (Secretly not wanting to deal with the stench anymore).

As said before. she only seems innocent, In reality she is extremely manipulative and tends to be very cheap, even getting to the point of begging, flirting and even pretend to cry just in order to achieve victory by lowering her opponents' guard.

=Update=
After defeating titus she became a champion, oddly enough, even if she became a chamipion she still did not evolved to a zoroark. yet. what she lacks on size, now she haves it on stench. Nobody knows where she went after defeating titus...but she came back smelling worse than ever. Despite of this, her ressistance to stench isnt as amusing as the ones of other champions.

Stink stats:
Feet:Ungodly
Farts:Deadly x 8
Body Musk:Ungodly
Butt (Without Farting):Deadly x 2
Breath:Ungodly x 2

Stink resistance (50 of 100)

6. Any special abilities
(Special) Silent but deadly: While she rarely uses her illusion abilities, she does haves one trick with then, the trick consist on her using her illusion to make herself vanish, then unleashing a big fart up to her enemy's nose while it is unable to see her.
(Special 2) Illusion pin down: She uses her ability to change the landscape and trick the opponent to remain still and sit on its face easily (Takes down her resistance by half due to her having to focus, which sharpens her senses.)
-Fake tears: She resorts to crying in order to make the other Pokemon to lower its guard.
-Attract: Will make her rival fall in love with her temporarily.

(extra)Weak spots: She cannot stand any breath stench that is worse than her own. becoming way slower and easier to pin down if she is forced to sniff from up close.

She is not incredibly strong. so if you can mannage to hold her still, she would rarely be able to free herself with just strenght alone.

Her gas is her most lethal attack and she tends to rely on it too often, if you find a way to prevent her from farting up a storm she would become way easier to deal with, and lose some confidence.

1553322222222222323222222223332221.content:
1. Ruby (Raichu)

2. Female

3. The eldest of the six sisters in Rena's family. She left when Rena was only a little Pichu. This was mostly because their parents kicked her out since she refused to stop smothering her siblings under her huge, raunchy soles until they passed out! Ruby made sure to give her parents one last whiff too before venturing out into the world.

In her travels, Ruby met lots of new Pokémon... and forced a good majority of them under her feet. A few she took as slaves, the rest were scarred for life with the memory of her gargantuan grungy feet.

Eventually, Ruby found a flyer for the stink tournament, but ignored it. It looked way too easy for someone of her talents. That is... until a couple of months later, when she saw a magazine with her little sister and favorite footstool, Rena on the cover. She immediately made the long journey (on foot, of course) to come see the tournament that her little sister entered. Ready to smother and enslave any who dare oppose her.

Upon reaching the tournament, she found that her sister had left for the Dungeon of the Secret Stat. So instead she battled and defeated both Daode and Jason, doubly securing her champion title.

4. Stink stats
Feet: Deadly (x20)
Farts: Unscented
Body Musk: Unscented
Butt (Without Farting): Unscented
Breath: Unscented

5. Stink resistance (100 out of 100)

6. Abilities:

Static: Relatively self explanatory. To much physical contact with Ruby can result in paralysis.

Bigfoot: We can all agree that one of the best qualities of a Raichu is their huge feet. Well, Ruby's are huge even by Raichu standards!

Double Teamed: Ruby can make up to ten copies of herself. All with the same level of foot stink.

Neurology: A very special power Ruby holds. Her mastery of electricity is so strong, that she can control neural synapses in other Pokémon. She can force their bodies to do things, or outright control their minds!

Sidelines: Ruby released all but one of her slaves upon coming here. The remaining slave, a male Gabite, holds a trunk and waits on the sidelines. Ready to run up and open it at Ruby's command.

The Sock Trunk: The trunk carried by her aforementioned slave is large enough to hold multiple Garchomp inside. It's filled with nothing but her used socks and footsweat. And if a Pokemon is unfortunate enough to be locked inside, unless they're a hardcore fetishist, their brain will certainly be fried, leaving them a mindless, foot obsessed husk.

Magic Boots: After seeing her sister's pair from the secret stat dungeon, Ruby *ahem* "convinced" a local magic item store to er, "donate" a pair that they had. These boots are possibly the only footwear around capable of containing her foot stench. Not only that, but they're enchanted to make her feet constantly sweat while wearing them, and when she throws one at someone, it automatically tracks their nose and places it's opening over it before tying itself around their head!

Berserk Button: Do not. I repeat, do NOT! EVER mistake Ruby for her sister or in any way even suggest that Ruby may be inferior to her!

He had the most filthy, dirty, stinky pair of feet on the whole island, and looves to feel pokemon and humans under his soles, and is fond of being worshiped. However he is very gentle, and kind. He never wants pokemon to suffer...but he can't help but get them under his toes...he just loves the way they feel! He was amazed to read that his long lost cousins were famous and rich stink champions! He wanted to try it! Soon he became a champion after squashing Rena!

4. Stink stats
Feet: Deadly (x17)
Farts: Ungodly
Body Musk:Pretty Bad
Butt (Without Farting): Pretty Bad
Breath: Pretty Bad

5. Stink resistance (90 out of 100)

6. Big Feet!: Like the rest of his family, Ray's feet are gigantic! (actually a size or two bigger than Ruby's!)
Psychic surfer: Ray is very adept with his psychic abilities, hypnotic, mind reading and using it to put more force into his movements.
Disable: Once special ability is used by an opponent, Ray can use disable to stop it from happening again!
Shrinking boots: Just like his cousins, Ray got a pair of magic boots. If a pokemon sniffs the boot, they shrink! If they get stuck in the boot they'll stay tiny, but a few minutes of fresh air will bring them back to regular size.
1553322222222222323222222223332223321.title: Ray!

1553322222222222323222222223332223322.content:
Name: Gabriel (Gabe)

Gender: Male

Species: Alolan Raichu.

Personality. Gabe is extremely easygoing and friendly with a cheerful attitude. He is adventurous and can be a little reckless for the sake of having fun. He's also got a bit of a mischievous side and can be a little sadistic, however, he rarely truly means any harm. Gabe also doesn't get offended easily and won't hesitate to laugh at jokes someone else, or even himself, makes at him. He is prone to bouts of curiousness and is willing to try just about anything.

Bio: Gabe is a trainer-raised Alolan Raichu who met his trainer at a very young age. As a Pichu, Gabe was one day out exploring. As he did, he stumbled across a young boy, asleep at the edge of his forest home. Curious, he investigated the boy. However, he was soon distracted by the boy's backpack. The boy had awoken to the sound of something rummaging around in his pack. It was then that he found the little Pichu with his upper half buried in the bag. when the boy pulled him out, he discovered that the Pichu had been raiding his stash of gum. However, Gabe showed no far, and instead seemed to laugh as the boy caught him in the act. After being out down however, the little yellow mouse did not flee. The boy, being a fledgling trainer, invited Gabe to his team. an offer Gabe happily accepted. At that, he discovered the boy's name to be Marko, and was given his own name.

From that day forth, Gabe fought happily alongside Marko. His trainer's love of battles had rubbed off on him fairly well and he loved to fight, especially if it made his trainer proud. However, just as he loved to fight, he loved to relax and take things easy as well. He loved spending time at the beach and ecploring the jungles. But his favorite thing to do was eat. As Marko quickly discovered, Gabe had a fondness for sweets, especially gum, and he loved to spoil him. Especially if he did good in battle. In fact, it was Marko who taught Gabe how to blow bubbles with gum, which Gabe happily practiced on his own time. However, a diet of candy and Malasada had an effect on the growing Pichu. Not only was it making him portly, but also rather gassy, and soon Gabe became the most flatulent member of Marko's team. Marko didn't think much of it though, and found it funny. Not to mention that Gabe seemed to enjoy it, especially when it came to seeing how his team mates reacted to it.

Eventually came the day where Gabe finally evolved into a Pikachu as Marko progressed through is Island Challenge. Not only had Gabe grown stronger, but his stench did as well. Though Marko was sure to bathe Gabe regularly, he soon found that Gabe rather enjoyed his stink. Not only that, but his feet seemed to grow particularly sweaty to the point where washing them was not a long term solution. Despite having to put up with some extra stink from his beloved Pikachu, there was at least one good thing to come out of it. During Marko's battles, he found Gabe taking his opponents by surprise, using his various stinks to attack them as well as his moves. In fact, Gabe's unexpected, yet surprisingly potent tactics won Marko numerous battles. Even if none of his other moves were effective, his stink often did the trick.

Being the cornerstone of Marko's team, Marko wished to evolve Gabe and make him even stronger. Excited at the prospect, Gabe happily accepted and soon evolved into a Raichu with the help of a Thunder Stone. However, with his new form came new opportunities. As Marko continued his challenge, Gabe began practicing more and more techniques. Particularly ones that utilized his new psychic powers. It was then that Gabe began incorporating the use of bubblegum in his repertoire, combining his stinks with pig, psychically enhanced bubbles. Not only that, but his stinks grew even further, and his feet, even sweatier. After mastering his new techniques, Marko became a force to be feared with his odd, but mighty Raichu. However, Marko eventually decided to take a break from his challenge. He had built up quite a group of Pokémon in his travels, and wanted to get to know them. With that, Gabe offered to part ways with Marko for a little while. Not for his own benefit however. As it is, he had heard news from other Pokémon of a land, vastly untouched by humans with an arena where they practice fighting through use of stink. Victors of the arena won all sorts of rewards. Knowing this, Gabe parted ways with his master for a while in hopes of winning goodies for him from across the sea. With that, Gabriel set out on his own to the Smelly Pokémon Tournament to make his master rich! A goal he was brought even closer to by becoming a champion after his battle with Ray!

Stink Stats:

Feet: Deadly x7
Farts: Deadly x9
Body Musk: Horrid
Butt (without farting): Putrid
Breath: Deadly x7

Stink Resistance: 85


Abilities:


Bubble Gum: One of Gabe's primary techniques involves the use of bubblegum which he manipulates with psychic energy. Gabe often uses these bubbles to try to ensnare his opponents, using psychic energy to prevent them from popping. It also makes them more durable, making them hard to break out of. He can also force them to pop, directing his stink in whichever direction it pops in. The gum is also very sticky and he can use it to bind or trap his opponents. He also has a tendency to swallow his gum, and make use of it in other, creative ways. The flavor of the gum can also alter the exact stink of his breath.

Sweaty Feet: Gabe's feet are so sweaty that others may suspect him of actually being a part water type who has sprung a leak. Of course, he's not part water type but he is fully capable of drenching his opponent in foot sweat.

Pinpoint Paralysis: Gabe does not paralyze Pokémon in the traditional sense. Rather, he utilizes precision control of electricity and psychic energy to paralyze specific areas of an opponent. he can use this ability to weaken foes by cutting off methods of attack and movement. This ability requires Gabe to make contact to the area in question with his face however.

Tail Surfer!: Gabe is a fair bit chubbier than most other Raichu due to his sugary and fatty diet, and although that does slow him down a bit on foot, he can zip around with ease by surfing through the air on his tail. He can speed himself up even faster by sliding on a layer of his foot sweat and directing electricity to his tail.

Perfect Double Team: Gabe is capable of using a customized version of Double Team. Unlike other Double teams, he only creates one clone at a time. However, the clone is a perfect replica of Gabe, impossible to discern through mundane means. It is capable of speech and shares the same level of stink as Gabe along with possessing all of his abilities. This is accomplished by Gabe partially splitting his mind and forming a psychic link with the clone. It will act and fight just like Gabe while also providing sensory information. As a result, it's a perfect clone. However, there is one major difference. Since it is still a clone, It can't take much punishment and can be taken down easily. However, when defeated, it will explode into a cloud of gas, choking it's attacker, but also stunning Gabe for a brief moment while his mind reassembles. Due to the strain on his mind from doing this however, Gabe typically will not create another clone for a little while after the first one was destroyed. Doing so often results in migraines.

Likable: Gabe has a cheerful and accommodating personality that is rarely offensive. Given time, Gabe's cheerfulness tends to rub off on others and no matter who it is, they often find something they like about him.
1553322222222222323222222223332223322.title: Gabriel the Alolan Raichu.

15533222222222223232222222233322233231.content:
Name: Mags

Species: Mudkip

Gender: Male

Personality: Mags is an energetic Mudkip with a go getter attitude. He has a cheerful and friendly demeanor, but can get a bit rowdy and competitive. If Mags ever thinks something sounds fun, you can be certain he's going to do it, regardless of consequences. He's brave and virtually fearless but is also prone to recklessness and getting in over his head. still, Mags is never one to quit or back down and always sees things to the end, no matter how sweet or bitter it may turn out.

Story: Mags was born and raised in a swamp; a rather smelly swamp. In fact, there were few times where he ever actually left it since everything he and his family needed was right there. Ever since Mags learned his first attacks, he was using them to annoy and wrestle his sibling. always for fun of course. as he got older, he would challenge other swamp dwellers to battles, becoming rather good at them.

On occasion, Mags would wander out of the swamp, just to see what lied beyond the tree line. it was his first visit to the areas outside the swamp that he realized something rather prominent. Mags really really stunk, as many Pokémon he came across made very clear to him. At first he felt bad about hearing that. he had never heard anyone say anything about him in the swamp. after spending a few days out here before returning, that's when he realized why nobody had ever brought it up before. The entire swamp stunk. It stunk to the point where pokemon who didn't live there would take the long way around just to avoid having to pass through it. however, Mags didn't mind the smell, after all, it was the smell he'd known his whole life.

Eventually, word got around in the swamp that there was a tournament designed specifically for smelly pokemon. many residents of the swamp grew excited by the idea, including Mag. It sounded like just the thing for him. Still, he didn't want to just rush out. he knew he had to train for it, learn to master his stink that his upbringing in the swamp had granted him. Eventually feeling satisfied with his progress, Mags traveled out into the world in hopes of proving his abilities to others and himself.

After Defeating and befriending Jason, Mags became a champion. After retrieving the Champion Serum, Mags returned to his home for a while for further training. Now stinkier than ever, He's returned to prove himself as a champion, make more friends, and perhaps find ways to become even stinkier!


Stink Stats:


Feet: Deadly

Farts: Deadly x3

Body Musk: Deadly

Butt (without farting): Deadly x2

Breath: Deadly x7

Water attacks: Deadly x2


Stink Resistance: 75


Special Abilities:

Swampy Water: Growing up in a swamp has forever morphed his water attacks into horrible swamp water which not only smells terrible, but created a lingering stench on soaked targets.

Swampy Terrain: From the start of battle, Mags is always working to turn the arena into a swamp with his water moves. as the arena becomes covered in more swampy terrain, the ground becomes muddy and the air is filled with a gradually thickening haze. pools of water also begin to linger, granting Mags an distinct advantage in this environment. The ambient odor also increases to resemble Mags's home, Assaulting Mags's opponent with constant odor.

Stinky Bubbles: Most of Mags's gas attacks come out in the form of a stream of gas filled bubbles. As a result, when the gas is within the bubbles, it does not create any sort of smell. however, when they do eventually burst, the smell is released, creating a surge of stench as more bubbles pop. the bubbles also make his gas long ranged. The streams of bubbles can be dodged however and the stench avoided entirely. If the bubbles make contact with a target, they pop with a sting and when bombarded, can knock opponents off balance keeping them trapped with the stench and any bubbles that want to pop on them. it also soaks the target a little.

Mega Stinky Bubbles: Instead of a stream of bubbles, Mags can blow large amounts of gas into a single large bubble before releasing it to pop on his opponents. even if it doesn't directly hit them, the blast radius can still get them with stink. and even stagger them if they are close enough. While the bubble is being blown, it is rather resilient, a a result, opponents can be caught and engulfed inside the bubble and forced to deal with the stink until it pops. This also bodes true for Mags as well if a crafty opponent manages to push him into his bubble or find a way to push it onto him. It is also possible to pop it with enough force.

Water gun: Mags can fire a thick and powerful jet of water out of his mouth to knock opponents around and soak them in it's horrible smell.

Hydro Pump: A much more forceful water gun. Mags uses this attack more often in an effort to flood the arena.

Mud Sport: Mags loves to make mud. not only does the muddy terrain eventually become swampy if he keeps up his water moves, but it also increases his bodily odors by two levels when he is covered with it. it's also quite sticky and will cling to opponents to assault them with odor and reduce their speed. Any water source or attack will clean off the mud though. Mags is also capable of moving around quite well in the mud and remaining hidden.

Swamp Power!: Mags's smelliest move. This move is preformed when Mags consumes some mud and combines it with water in his belly. he then churns the sludge around in his belly for a while as the odor refines and charges the attack. when ready, Mags lets out a massive bubble fart with a stink level of "Deadly x15" though he can prepare this attack whenever he wants. it takes time and concentration to charge up. any gas released while charging will release the current level of stink and he'll have to start over.

Gwomp: Mags likes to wrap his huge mouth around the face of his opponents, forcing them to inhale and smell his breath. when he is done, he likes to blow a burp bubble around their head before letting go.

Belly rubs!: Mags's ultimate weakness is having his belly rubbed. doing so will relax him gradually to the point where he may even fall asleep, leaving him open to any attack. be careful though as rubbing his belly can cause some gas to be squeezed out.

Sure footed: Mags does not suffer movement penalties on swampy or muddy terrain or when covered in mud or other goop.

Blind fighter: Mags is sued to fighting in hazy weather or murky water. as a result, low visibility does not cause much issue.

Swamp Immune: Growing up in his swamp has made Mags immune to it's unique odor. as a result, when his opponents are soaked in his water attacks. Their body odor has a significantly reduced effect on him.

Stink Eater: After becoming a champion, Mags trained his stink even further by placing foul things into his mouth, and even consuming them! though he has in no way developed a taste for such things, his tongue has become resistant to the taste of gas, sweat, and other such foul tasting stinky things. Not only that, but he can even swallow such moves and add them to his next belch!

Mega Hydro Pump: Once per battle, Mags can unleash an especially devastating Hydro Pump. To do this however, he requires time to concentrate and charge it up. Upon being unleashed, not only does it project a massive stream of foul water with tremendous force, but it creates a substantial pool to add to Mags's swamp.
15533222222222223232222222233322233231.title: Mags the Mudkip

155332222222222232322222222333222332311.content:
1. Spark (Pikachu)

2. Male

3. Spark is a Pikachu who's outgoing and bubbly when you get to know him, but he's shy about one thing...his fetishes. If you're willing to play with this Pikachu, you're in for a fun time! He came to the tournament for his...own reasons....yeah. He wants to find a Pokemon that can...indulge in his fantasies and fetishes for a while. He's seen the tournament on TV, and always enjoyed watching it at the same time every weekday. About his fetishes...he's a good ol' sadomasochist who enjoys being tortured by bad smells. He's ready to dish out some real stink (and sniff some too while he's at it). And, even if he wins, he'll still ask you shyly to have some fun with him. A real Swift at heart, minus the intense lust. Speaking of Swift, Spark "defeated" the Sylveon in order to become a champ!

4. Stink Stats
Feet: Deadly x7
Farts: Deadly x7
Body Musk: Deadly x6
Butt (Without Farting): Deadly x6
Breath: Deadly x6

5. Stink resistance (83 out of 100)

6. Special Abilities

Electricity!: As an electric type, he can paralyze or immobilize his opponents with a quick Thunder Wave! On the flip side, he's more immune to electricity and paralysis himself.

Stink Torture Fetish: He loves being forced to smell literally anything nasty, and will go through almost anything just to be forced to sniff! This can have its disadvantages, as he has a chance to throw the match just because his opponent smells so nasty! However, this can turn both ways, as he likes forcing others to smell him too!

Nasal Zap: Because of...reasons, Spark honed his ability to control electricity, up to the point where he can super-stimulate the olfactory neurons and nerves of a pokemon's nose and make him or her extremely sensitive to smells! He can use it on both himself (which is why he learned how to use it in the first place) or on others. A literal sensory shock!

Size Matters: Spark is larger than the average Pikachu, but he's still slightly smaller than a Raichu. This can lead to rather advantageous or disadvantageous situations with him concerning his size.
155332222222222232322222222333222332311.title: Opponent!

1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.content:
I hurry to the arena as fast as my stubby legs will carry me. It's been a while since my last match thanks to having spent some time away, training with my dad. Now that I'm back, I can't wait to try out my new stink! For everything I did to make myself smellier, I sure hope it's worth it.

It's not long before I pass through the gate, ready to take on the challenger who awaited me. Fortunately, you seem to already be here! Looks like my next opponent is a Pikachu. I eagerly approach before the stench of your body reaches me. for a brief moment, my movement begins to slow. Even with the training I've gone through, the stench of others is still something that requires getting used to, and your champion level body odor takes me a moment to acclimate to. Still, I approach you with a smile.

"Haha, hey there, I'm Mags! what's your name?" I ask as I look up at you.

It's not particularly often that I see Pikachu's, but something seems off about you. Are Pikachu's usually that big?
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.title: Fight!

1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.content: I giggle as I watch a Mudkip enter the arena, almost as excited as I am! "Hehe, well hey there! Nice to meetcha, Mags! I'm Spark!" I happily hurry over to you and extend a hand. Wow, ANOTHER Pokemon who seems like a fun person! First Swift, now you! I shake your hand...paw...whatever it is. It was then that I caught whiff of something that smelled like a rotting swamp. I wince slightly and joke "Heh, you been taking baths in a mud pit or something?
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.title: Friendly introductions.

1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.content:
I chuckle at your comment, mostly at the accuracy of it.

"Haha, you betchya! I live in a swamp, just got back from training there a couple days ago. I can't wait to give my new stink a try! Speaking of which, give it a smell" I say cheerfully.

You soon hear a gurgle rise up form my throat and in moments, my cheeks begin to puff out. Suddenly, I open my mouth and release a hefty, tonsil rattling belch, reeking of rotten swamp foliage and stagnant water, right towards your face, the likes of which I've only recently begun to have consistently. I then smile and look up to you.

"So, whaddya think? Stinky, right!?" I ask excitedly.
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.title: Actually...yes!

1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.content: My ears rattle as the ear-splitting belch echoes throughout the ring. The next thing that hits, however, is much stinkier. The stench of pure rot and nasty swamp water hits my nose, and I stumble back, gagging on the smell of your breath. Once I regain my footing, I look over you and say "Whew! *cough* That's some really stinky breath you got there~" It was so rotten! It's practically a swamp concentrated into one burp! I wish I could just lie under you and take in every single one of your-no. I gotta focus! I head back over to you and say "But how about you get a whiff of mine? Haha." I lean in and breathe out a lungful of noxious breath, giving you a good whiff of extreme halitosis!
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.title: Nice and strong!

choices: You have soemthign else you wanna say.
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.content:
My heart flutters with a sense of pride. You seemed to react quite favorably to my belch. I've never managed to even force myself to be this stinky before, and now this was just my new smell! As you return to your position and make your request, I grin and brace myself.

"Bring it on!" I say with a playful, competitiveness.

As your stink hits my nose, I immediately begin to choke. You have some foul breath yourself.

"Haha, wow, you got some nasty breath yourself! This is gonna be fun! We should hang out after the match!" I say before turning and quickly bounding away.

From there, I turn and face you.

"Okay, you ready Sparky?" I ask as I brace myself for combat.
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.title: "How's that for stinky?"

choices: You want me to go first!
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.content:
I practically jump with joy at the thought of having another Pokemon I could hang out with! Boy, this tournament is really friendly lately! Well...except for some of the champions. But even if I meet them, I'll sure get a nice stinky moment or two with them! But I digress.

"Hehe, thanks! And all right! Ready whenever you are Mags!" I reply, as I head to my own corner and ready myself for combat, my cheeks sparking with excitement! This was gonna be fun!
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.title: Time to fight!

1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.content:
I bounce back and forth, shaking my hips in anticipation. Once you're in your corner and look ready, I give you a nod.

"Haha, get ready Sparky! here I come!" I say, letting you know that the match is now underway.

Immediately, I use the distance between us to my advantage and begin filling my mouth with water, intent to start off strong with a Hydro Pump and start soaking the arena. Of course, striking you with it as well would prove a welcome bonus, but with the space between us, you probably have enough room to evade. Once it's sufficiently charged, I open my mouth and fire out a power torrent of swampy water straight towards you.
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.title: You go first!

1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.content: "Woah!" I exclaim as I see the massive torrent of water careening towards me. I dive out of the way just before the massive Hydro Pump smashes into the ground, splashing EVERYWHERE. Some of it splatters on my face, and as I take a quick whiff, I let out a gag. It reeked of swamp matter and rotting stuff! It was soooo nasty, but I was more shocked by the fact that it made a mud puddle right smack dab in the middle of the arena! "Woah! I wasn't expecting that from someone like you! That's so cool!! And stinky, too~" I giggle. "You seem pretty nice! Maybe after this we can head over to my place or something! But for nooooow..." I smirk as I fire off a weak thunder wave, hoping to paralyze you right from the get go!
1553322222222222323222222223332223323111.title: Still dry.

155332222222222232322222222333222332321.content:
1. Contestant: Denka the Lycanroc (Midnight form)

2. Gender: Male

3. Brief character description:
Hailing from Alola, Denka was once a smelly little Rockruff, with a penchant for fighting and trouble making. He would always bully pokemon he thought were weaker than him, delighting in their humiliation and the feeling of being stronger than them. In truth, this came from his family; being the runt of the litter in a Lycanroc Midnight pack was not very easy, and he was often beaten and stinked out by his siblings. Sick of their treatment of him, Denka left them to train. Doing so day and night on every weak pokemon he could find, it wasn't long before he evolved. With his new found strength and increased stink, Denka set out to find somewhere he could prove himself.

Being the runt of his pack, Denka is a bit on the smaller side for a male Lycanroc Midnight. However, his pack is known for it's strength, and Denka is very well bred, being the offspring of two of the pack's mightiest members. In other words, despite his stature, he is still very physically powerful. Being the runt also made him think a bit harder about fighting and training, giving him slightly better intelligence than other Lycanrocs.

In one of his very starting bouts, Denka met Drought, a Braixen Champion who is a master magician. After nearly getting easily beaten, Drought offered to use his powers on Denka to make him stronger. Denka greedily accepted, and with his newfound strengths, easily crushed Drought. After taking the champion serum, Denka has become even more powerful, both in terms of stink and strength. Now, after a small vacation, he is ready to challenge more champions!

4. Stink stats (Rate each of the categories on this scale
Good Unscented, Slightly Bad, Bad, Pretty Bad, Very bad, Rancid, Unbearable, Horrid, Putrid, Ungodly, Deadly, and Lethal (note: only characters that have successfully made it through the Secret Stat dungeon can obtain Lethal levels. See bottom for details.)
Feet: Deadly X7
Farts: Deadly X3
Body Musk: Deadly X5
Butt (Without Farting): Deadly X5
Breath: Deadly

5. Stink resistance (70 out of 100)

6. Any special abilities:

Confidence: As long as Denka is in control of his fight, he will perform well. In other words, if he is doing well and beating his opponent, he fights better. If he begins to lose control and starts losing, he will begin to panic. In this state, he fights more crazily and violently, but his overall performance drops. His stink resistance also drops the more he panics.

Runt: Denka is sensitive about his height. It's not easy for pokemon who aren't used to seeing Lycanrocs to notice, however Denka hates being taunted about his height at all. Taunting him will speed up his drop into panic mode.

Female Weak: Denka despises being bested by females; a lot of female Lycanrocs in his pack were especially cruel to him. That being said, Denka gets frustrated more quickly if he's losing to a female.

Hypnosis: Thanks to Drought's magic, Denka now has a hypnotizing gaze attack! It's very powerful, but requires time to use, and the opponent has to stare into Denka's eyes while they work their mojo.

Size Control: Also thanks to Drought's magic, Denka can control both his and his opponent's size! This requires a bit of energy to use, and is prone to backfiring if Denka is confused, but other than that it's a pretty straightforward change. The more drastic the size change, the more energy Denka uses.
155332222222222232322222222333222332321.title: Denka

info.brief_description: A champion based spin off of my interactive, A Smelly Pokemon Tournament
info.description:
Welcome! To the Champion edition of A Smelly Pokemon Tournament. This version of my story is centered around one thing. The victories of the Champion Characters. Therefore some new rules must be told of.

1. In this version, no NORMAL challenger is allowed to win against the Champions, you can be a tough or an easy fight, but you can't beat them in this version. However, a draw is allowed. But, in the champion vs champion section as well as the tag team section, champions can lose.

2. You aren't allowed to just make your own champion, you still have to beat one of them in the normal version first.

And now on to the normal rules, which are exactly the same as the normal version, excluding the added ones.

Feet/Paws/Talons
General Body odor
Belching/ Bad breath
Farting

I won't allow:
Scat
Sex
Vore
Death
Excessive violence
Anthropomorphic characters
Crappy one-line responses
Invading someone else's match MAKE YOUR OWN!!!

Here is a template to follow or how to show your character

1. Contestant Name (Species)

2. Contestant Gender

3. Brief character description

4. Stink stats (Rate each of the categories on this scale
Good, Unscented, Slightly Bad, Bad, Pretty Bad, Very bad, Rancid, Unbearable, Horrid, Putrid, Ungodly, Deadly, and Lethal (note: only characters that have successfully made it through the Secret Stat dungeon can obtain Lethal levels. See bottom for details.)
Feet:
Farts:
Body Musk:
Butt (Without Farting):
Breath:

5. Stink resistance (--out of 100)


6. Any special abilities

Other than that have fun training against, and inevitably losing to the champs

IMPORTANT THINGY ABOUT THE LETHAL STAT: Okay, there's now a new stat past Deadly called Lethal. And basically, unless you also have a lethal stat, you won't last three minutes without passing out. It is obtained through a branch of the society story called Quest for the Secret Stat.
